Apparently, your three conquerors are going to 'pay him a visit'. You almost feel sorry for him. Almost - Tora and the others might shift some of the less pleasant client requests onto him!

So, this is your life. You've proven to be a good Foot Piggy for Tora and her friends. If they continue to expand their client base and successfully another pathetic loser like you, then they should be able to branch out to the point that they won't need their everyday jobs. "Sooo ungrateful!" Anika says, frowning as she reprimands you with another slap around the back of your head. You wince as your brain works on overtime. May is admittedly very cute but she is one of Tora's friends....what is your devious ex playing at here?

"You should be thanking me! Look at her - she's way out of your league! The least you can do is thank me, loser!" Tora scoffs down at you while you continue to kneel before the three girls.

"Th-thank you," you mutter with some reluctance. This elicits more giggles and smirks from the girls.

"You see - he's perfect for you!" Tora grins at her petite friend.

You look up at May, confused as to what Tora means. "Tora's right," she says, trying her best to stifle a giggle. "I want the most wimpy, pathetic guy in the world. I want someone who will literally bow down to me and treat me like a princess." She completes this in a bit of a bratty tone.

Anika snorts with laughter as slaps you playfully across the face. "You are the definition of a wimp. And being a foot freak, you won't be able to say no!"

Al three girls laugh, Tora and Anika exchanging a high five as May stands in front of you, hands on her hips. She wrinkles her nose at you; you can't help but admit how attractive she is.

"I've never even had a boyfriend before," she says down to you. "Boys I've known have never impressed me. Some have tried to but that's not what I want. I want a pathetic loser like you."

Her words are so blunt. You find yourself staring at the ground, not having the nerve to keep looking her in the eye. Instead you focus on her small feet and pretty toes.

Tora chuckles. "As soon as I found out about your dirty little secret, I knew that I had to set you up with May. I mean, I am so over you; you're nothing to me now. But to May...you are just what she needs!"

Gulping, you feel humiliated beyond words. To be so pathetic and worthless, to the extent that you're the first suitable candidate as the wimpy boyfriend for May, yet you can't argue with their logic. May wants a wimpy guy who can't resist her...

"Now," Tora continues. "Bow down at her feet and beg her to go out with you. This is your best ever opportunity to get a girlfriend who you can actually satisfy!"

Slowly and with defeat circling inside you, you hang your arms limply by the side, your head lowering in surrender. All three girls chuckle at this as your face gets in the full view of May's pretty bare feet. Just as you're about to beg like the worthless, hopeless wimp you are, Lizzie's face pops into your mind. Can you actually do this...actually ditch your lovely girlfriend for May?!

Lizzie! You had completely forgotten about her! Shaking away the thought of your actual, official girlfriend, you remember how lucky you are to be May's boyfriend. With that she gives May a cheery wave, who - still on the phone - returns it as you walk back over to her with another three pairs. Nearly fourteen hundred dollars just on shoes... How the hell are you going to be able to afford being May's boyfriend?!

May puts the phone down. "Thanks," she grins as you carry the several bags of designer shoes. "You know what, I'll save the flip flops and flats for another time. I know - let's go for a drink! There's a bar not that far from here."

Come over to mine now. May's on her way.

Do you want me to share the content of your dirty little videos to everyone I know?"

However, you've never been in an actual position where you could end up spending your hard-earned money and savings!

"Now you may kiss my foot," she grins as she dangles a deliciously wrinkled bare sole just over your mouth. "You never know, Becky may let you taste her feet if you're lucky. But they're not a patch on mine..."

111133111221111113113321.content:
The next day, after instructions from Vicky, you find yourself totally surrendering your life - in return for keeping your secret quiet of course.

"So let me get this clear," Becky says excitedly as she sits on your couch, her eyes flickering with malevolence over to you. "Ross can't afford his apartment so you now owns it and we pay you rent?" The look on her fat, smug face is so unbearable!

"Yes, it's the perfect solution. You've been struggling to pay rent or find a roommate, Ross can't afford it here without me owning it and you paying to help." She smiles at her sister before turning to you, standing before them, trying hard not to feel humiliated. "Don't you have something to say, Ross?"

"Yes, um...thank you both," you say humbly, staring at your feet. Karen, who is sitting on a chair next to Becky, snorts.

"Ha! I knew this set up you had going was too good to be true." Her eyes shift between you and the Cox sisters.

"Hey, you can stay over for as much as you like. I'm the main tenant here like Vicky said, right?"

Vicky continues to smile. "Right. Basically, the debt Ross is in makes him a very minor lodger here. He's paying a fraction of what you are so I'd expect him to more of the chores, do the shopping, make himself useful."

Karen giggles. "He is gonna be your bitch!" She and Becky exchange a smug look.

Vicky adopts a faux-stern expression. "Oh, not at all. He is just grateful to be let stay here. Isn't that right?"

You nod humbly, too embarrassed and ashamed of yourself to talk. All of this could be avoided if you could risk Vicky letting your secret out. However, knowing the contacts she has and how she'd paint you in a particularly peverted light, you know deep down that you're beaten and have to accept your new lot in life.

One of the worst things is that Vicky has totally screwed you over. Not only are you still paying the mortgage for the flat that is in Vicky's name now, but Becky's contribution goes straight to her sister too. Worse than that, it didn't take long for Vicky to find out from you about your savings. She took all twenty thousand dollars and used it to move to a considerably bigger and plusher apartment.

As Becky and Karen head out, excited by the few hundred dollars as a present that Vicky has given to them (to "redecorate" the apartment) you are ordered to bow down to your conqueror.

"Do you just wish that I would let you worship my bare feet right now? She wiggles her gorgeous toes in front of you. Her feet are out of this world - even better than Tora's! A million times better than Becky's large, pungent ones...

"Please..." You murmur weakly, a wonderful sensation spreading over you. You get to serve her after all!

Vicky stops you with her toes pressing suddenly against your forehead. "Na ah. You had your chance and you turned me down. Bet you regret that now, huh! I told you I'd take everything," she beams at you. "I didn't think I'd be getting over a thousand dollars rent from you each month, plus the five hundred from Becks....and all of that money for my new place."

You let a small whine escape your mouth. She's right! You should have surrendered it all to her when you had the chance. You've literally lost everything and got nothing back in return!

"And you don't even get to serve me!" She giggles, shaking her head as if she's genuinely sorry for you. "We can't all be winners, Ross. And I win - again!" She says gleefully before turning on her heel.

"Oh, one more thing!" She calls back before leaving the apartment. "My sister's feet get really cracked and dry, especially after they've been sweaty. Rub some lotion in a few times a day, then they might be a bit more....appetising for you. See ya!"

You hang your head in humiliation, still on your knees - a broken man.

"Ross? Who was that? And what was that about her sister's feet?" A familiar voice snaps your head back up.

Lizzie! What is she doing here? Your girlfriend stands in front of you, her eyebrows raised as she awaits an explanation...

"A joke?" Lizzie's voice becomes a little incredulous. "A joke from the gorgeous blonde woman who just passed me in the hall? A joke about her sister's feet?

You begin to argue but realise the situation. You cannot risk displeasing Becky, or your sister one bit. If you do, Vicky could make things much, much worse for you. Swallowing all your pride, you nod as you feel too humiliated to even speak. "Sorry," you murmur in a small voice.

There's no way in hell HE's sleeping in there anymore! You can have the couch. And Ross can...." The two friends pause as their eyes meet and let out raucous laughter.

This sobering thought somehow spurs you on as you're determined to finish the living room as quickly as possible. Another twenty or so minutes later, you're done and even Karen and Becky seem to be impressed.

"Good work, Slave. Now onto my bedroom. Get the lilac paint ready," Becky instructs you, a satisfied expression on her face.

Obeying instantly, you avoid any more eye contact and make your way to what used to be your room. Nothing in it is particularly familiar now, except for the actual bed, carpets and wall colour, which is about to change. Pictures of Becky and her family are all over the sides. One is a particularly hot one of Vicky, which makes your dick twitch involuntarily.

You start off by kneeling on the bed so you can get to the parts from the carpet up - not an easy thing to do. You manage to move the bed back a bit, which takes some effort. The angle is now much better to paint from but a fresh wave of tiredness begins to wash over you. Your's - now Becky's - bed looks so inviting, so comfortable. If you could catch just a few minutes sleep, it would make the searing pain in your head stop; your eyes would be less shattered, your arms less heavy. Gradually, you begin to flop down on to the bed, a sense of relief and gratitude spreading through you.

For a fleeting moment, you realise that this would most certainly displease your Masters....are you able to fight the urge and not fall asleep?
1111331112211111131133211121111.title: You can drink the water in the toilet bowl!

choices: You sleep well! Off to work tomorrow!
Something happens during the night...
11113311122111111311332111211111.content:
Exhaustion finally takes over. As your mind seems to shut down and darkness descends over you, you sleep without dreams. It's just a physical necessity for you at this point to stop and allow yourself to be recharged. However, it seems like only moments when you are rudely awoken.

"SLAVE! What the fuck are you doing in my bed?" Becky stands over you, a furious expression on her unattractive face. She kicks you hard in the ribs, making you yelp, then rolls you off her bed. Crashing to the floor, you still groggy but fully conscious now.

"S-sorry," you mumble weakly up at one of your Masters. You wish now that you could have stayed awake.

"Sorry?!" She roars. "That's all you say for sleeping in my fucking bed?!"

"What the hell?" Your sister bursts into the room, narrowing her eyes at you. "You slept in her bed? You piece of shit..."

With that, both women begin stomping down on you, hard. They may be barefoot but the number of times they slam their feet against your unprotected torso, arms and legs, you feel throbbing with bruises in no times at all.

"Please, please....Masters!" You whimper up at them, tears rolling down your cheeks with the pain you're in. "Please stop!"

Finally they relent and sit on the edge of Becky's bed, their feet pushed hard against your whimpering face, their foot sweat intermingling with your tears.

"I can't believe you, Slave. A pathetic worm like you in Becky's bed? You have some nerve. Now keep begging us for forgiveness!"

You do, instantly. You plead, grovel beg and cower before your conquerors. You know that you're a snivelling, spineless creature but it feels...right, somehow. Like this is your place in life. As you whimper and plead with your Masters, you begin to place meek, subservient kisses all over their bare soles, tasting their foot sweat - the damp, popcorn like flavour immersing your tongue and dominating your tastebuds.

The women exchange a glance and smirk. "Wow. We didn't even ask him to kiss our feet," Becky remarks. An angry countenance returned when she looks at you. "Every day, when you get home from work, you will grovel at our feet and kiss them like the Goddesses we are. Anything less than this level of worship means that we stomp your pathetic body again. Got it?"

"Y-yes...M-masters," you whine up at them, feeling your pants tighten as you taste their feet. It may be your step sister and her fat friend, but these women have dominated you so much that you can't help but feel enamoured towards them - their feet especially!

"OK, Slave," Karen clicks her fingers at you, finally, so you stop. "Now get back to work. You need to finish this room and EVERY other part of the apartment before you go to sleep tonight. Got it?"

"Y-yes...Masters. Th-thank, you Masters," you add pathetically, making both women chuckle at your total surrender to them.

After a few more hours, you complete every single wall. You can't help but feel proud of pleasing your Masters as they pat you on your head in recognition for your good work.

"Time for bed now," Becky yawns. "Been a busy day. Night Karen. Slave, kiss me goodnight...." You look in total shock but it makes more sense when Becky lifts up the fabric of her shorts, along with the underwear covering her large, left butt cheek. "Now."

You scurry forward and meekly do so, almost gagging at the salty flavour of her ass sweat. She turns around, her face one of complete triumph. "I honestly thought it would take longer to break you, loser. When Vicky said I was moving in with you, I did wonder how long until you officially became my bitch. One full day - wow what a man you are!" She laughs as she gives Karen a hug tonight and slams her door shut.

Karen grins at you. "I always knew you were destined to be a Slave. Every humiliating thing that you do makes me feel strong. It comforts me to know that however crappy my life was, it's now a whole lot better than yours! I own you, Slave. Becky and I own you now and there's nothing you can do about it. Except learn to love it!" She sighs happily as she nestles into the couch and gets ready for sleep.

You can't find anything to say to her other than. "Th-thank you, Master..." as you lie down on the floor next to her and await her bare feet.

However they don't come! Karen seems to be fast asleep already! Does that mean you can have a full, decent night's sleep?!
11113311122111111311332111211111.title: Exhaustion takes over - you fall asleep!

choices: Evening with your Masters
111133111221111113113321112111111.content:
Knowing that this is a golden opportunity for a decent night's sleep, you gratefully allow tiredness to wash over you. As expected, your dreams are troubled, images of huge feet, toilet bowls, chunks of cheese all circling around together, making you wake up rather suddenly. Still, you have slept well and feel refreshed when you quietly creep up from the floor, ignoring your snoring step sister.

When you get to work, Amanda views you with some amusement. "Decided to show up today, huh?"

"Er, yeah. Thanks for yesterday, again by the way. I owe you one." You tell her, trying to be 'normal' around Amanda. It's hard not to feel gooey-eyed around the attractive brunette.

"Yeah, you do. In fact, I'm gonna cash that in now. I've got a project that needs completing and I've got other things to work on. I'll send you across the files - it's gotta be done by 4pm today. Make sense?" She stares at you expectantly.

"Uh, yeah, I will...I mean, of course," you babble. "I'll get on it."

She nods at you, smiling. "Good boy."

Gulping, feeling more than a little inferior to the bespectacled brunette, you get on to it. The hours pass relatively quickly; you have more energy than you have in days and are able to fully focus on your work and actually don't end up thinking about how much your step sister and Becky have humiliated over the last couple of days.

Your boss suddenly pokes his head around the door, at around half past three. He seems surprised that you knew nothing of the final submission of the promotion application, which is in half an hour from now and apparently Amanda told you about it yesterday....

"Amanda!" You splutter, storming into her office. She's printing something off, it looks like several pages worth. "The application...half an hour...?"

"What's that Ross?" She stares at you wide-eyed. "Didn't you know? I'm sure I told you yesterday..."

"No, you didn't!" You tell her loudly. "You've made me work on that stupid project all day while you've-"

"Can you not talk to me in such an aggressive manner?" She cuts you off with a raised eyebrow and hand put in front of your face. "I can't keep track of everything. You chose to go home yesterday, remember? Anyway, you've got like, half an hour. Just type up something. Didn't take me long."

You can't believe her. What a lying piece of work! Realising that you're gaining nothing from arguing with her, you make a speedy return to your workstation, abandoning Amanda's stupid project and quickly typing up what you think will be a half-decent final submission for the application. Time evaporates away; all you have is half a page. Increasing the font size and changing the formatting around, you make it fill a page, print it and hand it in to your boss, moments after Amanda does.

"Good luck, Ross," she gives you a fake smile, her eyes wandering down to the single sheet of paper you have just handed in. "Just the one page, huh?"

Your boss looks up at the two of you. Deciding not to make a scene as it would only make you seem petty, you merely smile back before heading back to your computer.

An hour or so later, just before you're due to finish, both you and Amanda are summoned in to the boss' office. Surprise surprise, Amanda has the promotion! He congratulates her, explaining that she'll get a bonus for this month too. There's more too. You're submission was, frankly, appalling. You're told in no uncertain terms that you'll be working closely with Amanda from now on - she'll be your boss, essentially. Swallowing all of your pride, knowing you need this job, you meekly accept.

As you leave the office, Amanda pats you on the back. "No hard feelings, right? I mean, even if you'd had more time on your application it wouldn't have made much difference - mine was 'exemplary' after all!"

You grimace, being careful what you say. "Yeah, sure," you mutter in a small voice.

She grins at you. "Great! Anyway, have a nice evening. My boyfriend's coming over to celebrate tonight - he knew I'd get this! See you bright and early tomorrow!"

She waves you goodbye, making you feel a good foot or so smaller!
111133111221111113113321112111111.title: You sleep well! Off to work tomorrow!

1111331112211111131133211121111111.content:
Arriving back at your Masters' apartment, you feel worthless, dejected. You drop down to your knees and meekly crawl over to where they are sat, their usual spot on the couch. Both are wearing dressing gowns, face masks and cucumbers over their eyes.

"Oh, Slave!" Becky says as you kneel before her, holding one foot in your hands and showering it with kisses. "Now keep quiet while we exfoliate."

Staying silent, other than the sound of you meekly kissing Becky's large, yet increasingly smooth sole, you can't help but think about Amanda and how she screwed you over. Moving onto the large blonde's other foot, she smiles contentedly, while Karen smirks above you.

"I love what a total bitch you are, Slave. You definitely know your place. After you've kissed all of your feet, then you can have a drink from the toilet bowl. From now on ALL of your drinks will be from there. Got it?"

"Yes Master Karen," you say humbly, still kissing Becky's other foot before moving on to your step sister's. Karen's is much sexier, much prettier than Becky's and is so soft and smooth. Thank goodness they can't see you; your erection builds steadily as you kiss each of your step sister's feet.

After that it's the usual routine of cooking their dinner, you eating their scraps and leftovers, then washing up, cleaning the apartment before giving each Master a pedicure and tongue bath. Then finally, dropping down to your usual spot on the floor by Karen's feet.

"Night, Slave," Your step sister sighs contentedly as she lowers her feet down onto your grateful face. They are so soft and comforting; you actually fall asleep, breathing in your step sister's foot scent all night.

Waking early, you find that Karen's feet slide off you easily, so well-cared for and moisturised they are these days. They've always been pretty but now they're practically flawless, similar to Tora's! Getting ready and arriving at work, the first thing you notice is that Amanda has a new office, her name already etched onto the glass window. Glowering, you try your best to ignore how embarrassing it is, especially when other coworkers mention Amanda's promotion.

Over the course of the morning, you barely achieve anything. Feeling suitably aggrieved, you manage to make it to lunch without really achieving very much. A couple of female coworkers give you funny looks after they pop into Amanda's new office.

"Ross, can I have a word please?" Your new boss, the bespectacled, pretty brunette pops her head out of her office, summoning you in.

"I've been thinking about what the big boss said yesterday. My job is to raise your game - I'm responsible for you. In light of that, I need more from you. Your productivity has been way off the last few days, especially this morning; if it doesn't improve by the end of the week then I will have to have a serious discussion with the Powers That Be whether or not you can actually hack this job," she states authoritatively.

You stare at her open-mouthed. "What...I..really...?"

She sighs. "Ross, I know it's awkward us both being at the same level, now me being your superior. However, there's no excuse for you to slack off. You took most of the day off a couple of days ago. In fact, what have you actually achieved this week?"

Doing everything you can to remain calm, you take a deep breath. "I'll...do better," you say through gritted teeth.

"That's more like it! Now, I need that project I gave you to finish yesterday emailed to me before tomorrow, plus the program that I've just taken off Felicity. Also by tomorrow. Actually by tonight, so I can check over them before I go to bed," she instructs you. "OK, you can go now."

Leaving with your tail between your legs, you realise you have about seven hours work ahead of you...and it's nearly one o' clock! Not wasting any more time, you focus on one job at a time, trying your best not to let the humiliating situation with Amanda get to you.

When your new boss checks on you at 5:30, her coat on and laptop packed away, she gives you a reprimanding look. "Ross, don't stay too late. Just finish the tasks I set you and get out of here. You look like you need a proper night's sleep."

"Sure...I'm...almost done," you lie, knowing you've got at least another hour or so to go. Finally, at a little past 7 pm, you are all done, emailing Amanda the files and heading back to your Masters.

Your Masters!

Shit, they are going to be seriously pissed that you're late! Tearing home, you probably have got several speeding fines. When you get in at half past seven, you are met with two thunderous faces.

"You are in so much trouble," Your step sister tells you, shaking her head...

11113311122111111311332111211111111.content:
You don't even try explaining yourself; what would be the point? All you do is drop to your knees, apologise and grovel before your Masters, hoping they will go easy on you. Unfortunately, you have seriously upset them - they've had to wait hours for dinner, are hungry and pissed off with you.

Making sure you learn your lesson for being a couple of hours late home, they take turns in kicking you in the balls until you are sobbing like a baby. After that they allow you to cook them a late dinner, then clear up and carry out your usual evening tasks. It is nearly midnight when you finish giving each Master a very subservient foot rubbing with a pumice stone. Having not had any dinner, you're allowed to eat their dead skin, which is suitably salty and unpalatable.

Instead of sleeping on the floor by the couch at Karen's feet, you're instead shut up in the broom closet, cramped and finding it nearly impossible to get a comfortable sleep. Finally, you nod off; after what seems like minutes later, you're released and told to go to work.

The only thing is that you're late! As you desperately arrive in, feeling red-eyed and not even dressed properly, Amanda gives you one look before ushering you straight into her office.

"What the hell is going on? You arrive twenty minutes late...you look like you've been dragged through a hedge backwards. Ross, this is NOT good enough!" She has a livid expression on her face. "Remember yesterday when I told you that I'm responsible for you. Well, I'm gonna do you a favour. No more projects this week. You can do some chores for me instead.

You lean back in the chair, head thumping, barely taking in what she's saying. "Sure...thanks," you croak. You grab a coffee then return to her office. Amanda has got some filing for you to do - menial tasks, but you have to admit what you're pretty much able to cope with today. The day goes slowly; you find yourself sneaking a look at Amanda's pert ass, her bare feet - when she slips off her flats occasionally - luckily she doesn't seem to notice any of this.

At the end of the day she has another meeting with you. "Ross, I've been talking to the big boss. How can I say this... after looking at your performance, comparing what Felicity has achieved today... he doesn't want you to continue in that role."

"What..?" You gasp. "But I...I thought I had...this week?"

"Well, so did I," she gives you an apologetic smile. "Good news though - you can accept your contract will be terminated, or have a slight career realignment. It will be at about half your current salary but I managed to get this opportunity for you."

"What is it?" You ask her weakly, feeling your whole world crumbling around you.

"My personal assistant!" She practically beams at you. "What do you say?"
11113311122111111311332111211111111.title: Punished!

111133111221111113113321112111111111.content:
Although it's utterly mortifying, you know that you cannot refuse. Not only because the idea of looking for a job elsewhere seems like too much of an ordeal but you're also so humbled by Amanda that you find yourself nodding weakly.

"Good boy. Anyway, a few things for you to remember, starting tomorrow. Make a note of these...."

Amanda reels of a few day-to-day tasks she wants you to do. She expects a cafe latte on her desk first thing, before she arrives, which means you getting to work before your scheduled hours. Along with your regular programming duties, she needs you to make a start on a new project, plus pick up her lunch and coffee at midday..."

"Am I your errand boy too, then?" You say, forcing yourself to stay polite.

She smiles. "Well, in your amended contract it basically says you will do anything I tell you. If it means get me a coffee, you get me a coffee. If I need you to stay late to finish off some work, you'll do it. If I need my dog walking, then you'll walk her. Oh, that reminds me - Fifi needs two walks a day: one at 11am and again at 3pm. Don't worry - she's in my office so you don't have to pick her up from anywhere. Saves money I was paying that dog walker! Oh, you will need to pick up...well, you know..." Amanda gestures towards where Fifi, a haughty looking poodle is sitting in the corner of the room, doggy bags and a pooper scooper already next to her bed.

"And if I don't...don't want all these....tasks?" You ask her, feelingly increasingly helpless.

She raises her eyebrows. "You don't want to work for me, Ross? I thought we were friends? I thought you liked me?"

"I do, I do!" You say quickly, flushing red. "It's just...get you coffee....walk your dog?"

She beams at you. "You'll be just great. I mean," she lowers her voice. "If you don't accept and sign, then you're basically out of a job with a...pretty rotten reference... Now, off you scoot. Remember my cafe latte first thing..."

You make a hasty exit, too ashamed to look her in the eye as you pack up your work station before heading home. You're actually slightly early this evening, which gets you zero brownie points from your Masters as they've gone out for the evening - typical! Realising how hungry you are, you have dinner then head straight to sleep, in your usual spot. Completely sparked out like a light, you are barely conscious of your step sister's feet being roughly shoved in your face when she and Becky return in the early hours of the morning.

Waking with a start, you carefully remove your sister's feet, which are a little sticky with sweat and other bits of grime. You make a mental note to do an extra good job moisturising and servicing them later. Anyway, you need to focus on another woman who is dominating your life: Amanda!

Probably another Tora, you reason...

"Oh you're at work, sure. Yeah, yeah I think I remember him...what was his name...?" Naoko suddenly frowns shooting you a look. "Yeah, Ross. And he lives in....that apartment block? Well, that's the one I've just moved to! Yeah, I will. No problem. See you!"

She puts the phone down, observing you very carefully. "Well, that was an interesting phone call..."

You gulp at her. "Please, please don't tell Tora...don't tell her you know me...please..." You say before she can say another word.

She tilts her head to one side. "Oh really? Why?" Holding her beautiful feet in your hand, you babble the truth to her - about your foot fetish, about how Tora seems to have found out... You beg her again not to tell Tora anything. Promising to do anything, Naoko finally quietens you with a pat on the shoulder.

"It's OK, I get it. I'm not like Tora - I can imagine how much she would love to blackmail you, to have you pretty much as her bitch, I get it. I just like doing a deal that both parties benefit from - like you do some painting, cleaning, moving, and I let you rub my feet! If I'm honest, I quite like you. You do seem like a decent guy, even though you're hopeless around women's feet!" She giggles. "Last night, you seemed nice, normal, then you became a babbling wreck!"

You nod, agreeing with everything she has said.

"So, no - I won't tell Tora a thing. As long as you keep helping me out - with me letting you rub my feet in return. I can also help you out more too..." She tells you eagerly, leaning forward. "I can tell Tora that you've moved apartments - that will throw her off the scent!"

You stare at her, in a disbelieving way. "Really...are you sure?"

"Yes, it's all good! Like I said, I quite like you. I've got no need to make your life a misery!"

Naoko's kind, understanding treatment of you sets of a chain of events. You're devotion towards Naoko means you happily do anything she asks you, not just so you can give her foot rubs, but because you genuinely want to help her. Unfortunately, you get fired at work, as missing one too many days costs you. To make matters worse, Amanda got the promotion you were going for, and was actually in the board meeting where you got fired.

Karen and Becky are furious with you, especially as your 'Slave' duties have become increasingly slack. They chuck you out, done with you. Naoko takes you in, finding you a job at the kendo club she goes to. It's basic stuff - cleaning, wiping down equipment...but it's something. The rest of the time you do chores for her, continue giving her foot rubs but nothing more - she's very firm on that! The Japanese girl ensures that Tora never sees you, allowing you to hide in the broom closet. This doesn't happen too often. Naoko is quite a lone wolf so she doesn't have friends over that much, nor does she have a busy social life. Most evenings, you watch box sets of DVDs, or help her with her kendo training - which means a lot of her taking you down, practising submission holds...none of which you mind int he slightest!

Yet you're happy with your lot. Your life hasn't turned out the way you've expected but you accept who you are and so does Naoko!
111133111221111113113321112111112121.title: Skip work, go to Naoko's!

choices: The truth - she tells them about your fetish, Vicky...everything!
1111331112211111131133211122.content:
"Er, I'm..yeah...we're still together," You manage to lie, even though Karen's bare feet are making you feel increasingly weak and compliant.

She looks at you curiously. "Hmm, interesting. Why don't you ask her over for dinner tonight?" She asks, her eyes lighting up. "It would be great to meet her!" She stops smothering your face for a moment and rests her feet casually on it, so you can speak more freely. "What's her name again?"

"Lizzie...can't tonight...she's...busy..." You say into her feet, still loud enough to be heard. Realising you've just announced her name, you curse yourself silently.

"Oh really?" Karen grins. "When can she do? Find out now!" She reaches around for your phone and flicks through the names. "Oh here we go - Lizzie! It's calling now."

Sliding her feet off your face she pulls them back and crosses them, so that they are positioned over your face, her toes gently bouncing off your nose.

Shit! Terror grips you as Lizzie answers. "What do you want Ross? I thought I made myself clear."

"I er, I just wanted to see if..um...you were able to come over for dinner?" You babble into the receiver. The look on your step sister's face is infuriating; she clearly enjoys seeing you squirm!

"Why do you want to see me? You know it's over, right?" She says, not unkindly.

"Well, my er, my sister wants to meet you..." You answer, before Karen grabs the phone from your hand and shoves her feet back into your face, leaving you dumbfounded and subjected to a fresh wave of cheddary and damp leather aromas.

"Hey, this is Karen. Ross' sister. Yeah, I know we never met before. My brother is being all shy and charming...but I can tell something's up. Come over for dinner - it really would be great to meet you and let you guys talk things through."

Your heart beat increases as Karen pauses and frowns. "Yeah I know everything that happened with Ross not being able to afford the rent and getting a room mate. You did? Well, that's news to me?" Karen slides her feet apart to give you an admonishing look. "OK, well, like I said, it would mean a lot to us both if you came over. OK. Great. See you at 7!"

Karen stares at you before firmly planting both soles over your face. "She broke up with you! I knew it! Still, she would't tell me any more. Good news - she's coming over later. You're gonna cook her the most incredible meal, dress up all smart, get her some flowers and win her back!" She says triumphantly pressing her soles so firmly into your mouth that you can't help but whimper.

"Why-why?" You finally gasp out when she releases you. "Why are you...helping me?"

"You're my little step bro! I'll always help you out!" She winks at you. "Now keep smelling my feet..."

This goes on for another few minutes: Karen talking to you about relationships, while smothering you with her feet. You feel nauseous but at the same time - much to your own disgust - a little aroused by how casually she is dominating you.

"Man, you look like crap! Get some more sleep - looks like you need it!" She says cheerily, before finally hopping off the couch and heading towards the bathroom. She's right - you do need some more sleep! You barely caught any last night with the smell of your step sister's bare feet pervading your brain! You close your eyes and are dead to the world in moments.

"Wakey wakey!" Karen chuckles as you once again feel the all-too-familiar stench of her toes scrunching against your nostrils. You splutter a little, which is immediately cut off by a bare sole firmly pushed over your nose.

"What time do you have to be at work?" Your step sister asks you. "Ooh, it's half past ten..."

CRAP! You were supposed to be at work two hours ago! FUCK!

Stammering, you try to force your step sister off you but she grabs both your hands and plants two bare feet over your face that your struggles are quickly reduced to whimpers.

"Sssh...take it easy bro. You'll be too late now to go in. I'll phone in sick for you. Gives you time to finish the painting AND prepare for your girlfriend!"

It does make sense. Missing a day of work is not ideal though, especially with that potential promotion looming. That frustratingly cute Amanda could schmooze her way into getting it, you think darkly. Anyway, Karen is right. Going in now would be worse anyway.

You spend the main part of the day painting the walls, as the two women instructed you yesterday. Having had some sleep you have plenty of energy and make rapid progress with it. When Becky finally emerges, she at first protests about Lizzie coming over later, until her demeanour suddenly changes after a quiet word from your step sister.

The hours pass as all of the painting is complete. Not ideal for wooing Lizzie - having the strong smell of paint in the air. Shrugging it off, you start to prepare dinner - Chicken Arrabiata with spaghetti: Lizzie's favourite. Grudgingly preparing enough for Becky and Karen too, you order in some flowers and get your best shirt, shoes and trousers ready.

At just 7, Lizzie arrives. Greeting her at the door, you realise two things. First of all, she is really cute, but not beautiful. Not like Tora. Second, she has a look about her that is resolute - not one that you're used to her from her - the only other time you've seen it is when she broke up with you yesterday.

Welcoming her in and sitting her down at the table with the others, you make introductions - as diplomatically as possible - and the four of you have general chit chat.You can't help but notice the coldness Lizzie shows towards your step sister and her friend. You told her enough to give the clear impression that they had not helped in your domination by Vicky. As you finish the food, Karen motions for you to get the flowers for the big gesture. Your heart racing, you do so and cough quietly behind Lizzie so she turns around in surprise.

"Lizzie, sorry about everything. I, I really want to be with you. I care about you," you tell her sincerely, trying to ignore the smirks on the other two's faces. "Can you...give me another chance?"

She stares at you in surprise. "Ross, you know why I broke up with you. I'm sorry but cooking me a meal, buying me flowers...it doesn't change anything."

"Why not?" Karen calls out. She has a knowing look about her. "I know we've just met, but you can tell Ross in front of us. It's OK."

Lizzie frowns before talking again. What does she say?
1111331112211111131133211122.title: Lie and pretend that you're still with Lizzie!

choices: Your new life!
11113311122111111311332111221.content:
Lizzie takes a deep breath before summarising everything you told her to Karen and Becky. It's as though you're not even there the way you are being talked about in the third person. You watch on in horror, too shocked to stop her. The brunette barely takes a breath as she finishes.

"And that's why I can't be with him."

"Wow....wow!" Karen says in total surprise. "I had no idea. I mean, I thought it was gonna be about the fact that he was crap in bed, or had a small dick...or something embarrassing. This is...something else."

Becky frowns. "So my sister is charging me five hundred dollars even though you're paying the full rent? What the hell?"

Lizzie makes an apologetic face. "Ross, I'm sorry but I had to say it. I haven't told anyone since your bombshell yesterday...I just...had to get it out." She makes a hasty exit; you don't even get to say goodbye.


Karen looks at you, shaking her head with a look of disgust in her eyes. "All those times you smelled my feet. This morning included! You were getting off on it? You're a sick freak!"

You start babbling at her. "K-Karen...I'm sorry, I didn't want, I mean I...please don't..."

Karen silences you with a look. "And Vicky blackmailing you! You're right Becks - she should not be charging you a single thing."

"I'm gonna give her a call now," Becky growls, standing up and gives you a filthy look like you're a piece of scum.

"Wait, wait," Karen suddenly stands up too. "From what we've heard, your sister is super bitch. Have you had any idea she uses losers like this?"

"Nope," Becky answers. "She's always been sweetness and light. Would never have put her down for this kind of gig."

"Listen. If we tell her we know now, we could lose this sweet deal. I mean, she is not gonna like the fact that we know about this freak's fetish. If she did, she would have told us, right? I've got a much better idea..."

Before you know it, you're lying flat on your back, both Karen and Becky's feet hovering over your face, Karen's phone in her hand as they stare contemptuously down at you.

"Repeat it back, loser. Now!" Your step sister barks at you.

"My name is Ross and I have a f-foot fetish. I can't resist women's feet..." You whimper up at the four bare soles that are dangling over you. Even though it's your step sister and her fat friend, four soles hovering above you in this manner is like a juicy bone being used to tease a slathering dog.

You continue doing this, knowing that it is blackmail material, knowing that you're incriminating yourself further. You don't have a choice though - before you agreed to saying whatever they wanted to, they threatened to share your secret. So this is just giving them some insurance basically. Why on Earth did you agree to having Lizzie come over? You could have made up a name or done something else! The fact that Karen and Becky have found out from her makes this all the more painful! Plus, you've been so clearly dumped that you have no hope now!

Once they're satisfied, they rest their bare feet casually on your face, leaving you to whine pathetically. This is all a bit much for you - blackmailed twice over now; you feel totally powerless.

"So, here's what we do," Karen says in a confident tone. "We don't say anything to Vicky. This loser here sets up a standing order to your account so five hundred dollars goes in each month. So you're here rent free! He also does the same for me - I want some extra cash too! We sell his things to give us a bit more money - that was gonna happen anyway. He gets a night time shift at McDonald's or somewhere so he can afford all these payments. All the money he has left over goes to us."

"Makes total sense," Becky admits. "So glad that I didn't go straight to my sister."

"No worries. Now we'll think of something to get at her another time, don't you worry. One step at a time." To emphasise her point, your step sister stands up with the weight of one foot pushing on your face, squashing it so hard that you merely gurgle in reply.
11113311122111111311332111221.title: The truth! Uh oh...

choices: At Lizzie's Feet
1111331112211111131133212.content:
You take a deep breath, knowing that telling her the truth is a huge risk. Lizzie shakes her head in disbelief as you share her all the details of your evening - from Tora messaging you to everything that happened with your step sister, to being blackmailed by your former teacher, Vicky. She even lets out a small "Oh!" of surprise when you fess up to your foot fetish. Finally, after staring at you for a good few moments or so after telling her everything, she speaks.

"Ross, that's...that's just too bad. I had no idea you had a foot fetish. I mean, that's a little creepy and all..." She winces as she attempts to smile reassuringly at you. "You know that you and I are through, right?"

In some ways it's a relief - your life is complicated enough! However, being dismissed as a boyfriend like this does sting. You nod and find yourself focusing on the ground. You really are a pathetic loser!

"If you had told me this before..." She says gently. "Who knows. Anyway, you must get how I can't be with someone who's this afraid of a secret and lets themselves get into a situation where they've literally given up everything!"

"Yep. Y-you're right," you say, feeling sorry for yourself. "Sorry," you add, knowing how much you've let your now-former-girlfriend down.

"You should go to the police," she says suddenly, as though having just thought of it. "Tell them the situation - how Vicky has blackmailed you, how she's taken all your savings, making you live with her sister...." Her voice trails off.

"Wh-what?" You stare up at her, wondering why she's stopped in mid-sentence.

Lizzie sighs. "It's no good, I guess. It's your word against hers - you gave up everything willingly at the end of the day. And from what you've said, she's not gonna twist the situation and make it potentially even worse for you." The cute brunette is right. Any chance you had of resisting or standing up to Vicky has long passed. Getting the authorities involved would only anger her. She would easily turn it all back on you!

"What should I do?" You look at her imploringly, uselessly.

Lizzie smiles again. "I can't just leave you like this. Look, it's over between us but I do care about you still. You were always a kind, decent boyfriend to me. Come and live with me at my place. We can give her an extra couple of hundred dollars a month to appease her. I don't mind your foot fetish. Don't get me wrong; it is creepy but I can deal with that. I could let you rub my feet while I watch TV." She grins at you, her head cocked to one side almost in amusement.

You have to admit it - it's a much better offer than you had. You quickly agree and decide with Lizzie how to phrase everything. Finding Vicky on Facebook, you send her a message. Replying mercifully quickly, Vicky seems practically excited.

Well, well, well. So you just want to pay more tribute to me? Well that's fine by me! Make it five hundred extra dollars a month and I'll leave you in peace. I can get my step sister to move in properly with Becky and get her to pay another half grand. Thanks for making me an extra thousand dollars a month better off. I'm going to quit my job now I have so much money coming in! Like I told you - I always win. :)

You gulp as you read her message, almost getting a hard-on from the sheer dominance of her words. Typing a meek "Thank you" in reply, your fate is sealed.

"All done?" Lizzie asks as you leave your apartment together, a rucksack of essentials packed.

"Um, yeah. She wants five hundred dollars extra. That's a grand and a half a month she's getting from me now." You sigh in abject defeat.

"Look at it this way - you weren't gonna have much of a social life, being a practical slave to Becky and your sister. Now you can work overtime to cover the costs. Plus, if you don't do anything creepy and be a nice little housemate for met, you can put any extra spare hours you have into my feet. From what I heard from Vicky, mine are a lot nicer than her sister's!" She pats you on your back, chewing her lip as if to stop herself from laughing.
1111331112211111131133212.title: You tell the truth. How does Lizzie react?

11113311122111111311332121.content:
The irony of your predicament is not lost on you. Here you are, lying on the ground with your ex girlfriend's bare soles covering your face. Only they do not belong to Tora. It doesn't take long for you to crave servicing Lizzie's feet. It starts with a massage, to a playful kiss here or there, to full-on worshiping!

What's difficult to shake off is the fact that you could have been doing this, for free, had you been honest with Lizzie before the whole situation with Vicky even came about. Although Lizzie's feet are nothing compared to Vicky's (or Tora's, admittedly), they are lot better than how you'd imagine Becky's to be. Still, the fact is that you now work longer hours, have very little free time - any of which is spent doing chores for Lizzie as a thanks for living at hers rent-free. Oh, and the fact that you are allowed to worship her feet - that pretty much takes up any other spare moment you have.

Lizzie is not malevolent like Tora or Vicky. In fact, she has asked for very little considering what you confided in her. If she wanted to, she could make things a hell of a lot worse! So you are grateful to her, even though her feet are average at best.

Having made it clear that she has no interest in a romantic relationship with you any more, Lizzie has started dating other guys. Out of respect to you, she hasn't brought any back to hers. If she did, she promised, she'd give you prior warning so you could make yourself scarce. It's a fair set up. You're able to keep paying tribute (or hush money, depending how you look at it...) to Vicky, you get to be at a woman's bare feet and you have a roof over your head.


"Hey Ross, I'm gonna have a nap now. Keep licking - it feels nice!" She says sleepily, spreading her short, stubby toes.

You grunt in affirmation and continue to do what you're best at. It's not much of a life but it could all be a LOT worse!

You groan, this couldn't be happening. You were drunk, there was no way you were going to beat your step sister in a video game now. But it seemed like Karen was holding all of the cards. So what was it going to be? Take another bet or let her tell the embarrassing story?

Karen grins at you but in her eyes you sense a touch of disappointment. "Aw - you afraid I'm gonna kick your ass again? Or..." She pauses as though the idea has just popped into her head. "Or is it that you're that worried about having to smell my feet in front of the others?"

"Do you remember that time I made him smell my bare feet for, like, ten minutes straight?" Karen says to Becky, winking at you as though giving you a reprieve.

Becky snorts. "Yeah that was hilarious! Or the time we each took off our dirty socks and tied them round his mouth so he couldn't talk!"

Vicky pulls a face. "Jeez, you two really liked to torture Ross!"

So, your girlfriend knows your dirty little secret too? I guess she won't mind me posting a few things online...
