Tora taps away on her phone for several minutes, swapping over her feet so that each heel takes turns to firmly dig into your back. While you act as her foot stool, you contemplate your situation. You are Tora's slave! She has broken up with Lizzie for you, taken away your phone, your wallet (including your credit card with pin code) and is now moving you out of your apartment, forcing you to move in with her! In a rather perverse way, you rationalise this in your mind: the more Tora takes from you, the easier life will be. You repeat this motto several times over in your head.

"Ok slave. Your apartment is no longer yours - all done! Good work at being a foot stool by the way! Next thing is your job. Now I thought about making you quit this, but actually the money would be pretty useful. So you're going to go to your 9 to 5 job at your company - you still work there right?"

You nod obediently.

"Good. Then when you get home each day, you can serve me," she states this matter-of-factly. How does that sound slave?"

"Fine thank you. Mistress," you quickly add this last word.

"Fine? Tora hops her feet off from your back and pushes you firmly onto the floor so you are looking up at her fright again. Does that not sound like complete heaven to you? Is 'fine' all you're gonna say?" Tora sounds a touch angry, as though you have not shown enough gratitude for her idea!

"Or is it that you want to be around me more than that?" She cocks her head to the side as she observes you shrewdly.
1112221212112.title: Foot stool for Tora then job talk!

choices: It's time for bed!
11122212121121.content:
"I want to be with you, all the time, mistress!" You babble at Tora. This is true: since accepting your place as her slave, just being around her is genuinely exciting for you.

She smiles. "I thought so. Expecting you to survive that long without me, from nine till five, Monday to Friday? That would be too much, right slave?" Tora pats your head patronisingly.

"Tell you what," she continues excitedly. "Since I've been promoted at work, I need to hire a lackey - someone to make coffee, do some filing, menial stuff really. I think I've found just the guy!"

Inwardly, you feel a little numb. Does she really expect you to be her errand boy at work? As well as her slave the rest of the time? Looking into her eyes, which are shining with confidence, you realise that she's completely serious.

Having signed off all the other parts of your life to her, it comes surprisingly easy, when you agree.

"Excellent!" She grins. "Now phone up your work to tell them you've got a new job. She tosses your phone to you. You make the call, awkwardly, embarrassingly. Fortunately they don't ask too much about your new "job".

"Okay, I think we're good for now. You can drive me back to my apartment. Remember, although it's the last time you'll be here, you won't be needing anything. Other than me of course." Tora walks dismissively away from you, puts her shoes on and waits expectantly at the door while you scrabble after her.

................

After arriving at Tora's apartment, you are quickly used as a foot stool again, while your mistress makes a few phone calls to friends, giggling and laughing most of the time. She doesn't mention specifically that you are her slave, which at the moment you are grateful for. Yes, you've accepted your place in life as her slave - that has become further cemented with agreeing to her every whim and order, but you're not ready for other people to know, just yet. You can't help but feel pangs of guilt about Lizzie. The way Tora spoke to her was brutal, but at least she did it for you, you reason. Wow - Tora has managed to make you feel grateful for doing that!

An hour or so passes while you continue to act as Tora's foot stool. Finally, she finishes her call and moves her gorgeous feet away from you...
11122212121121.title: A new job then back to Tora's

choices: Be a good slave and try to get some sleep
Lift up the covers and try to smell Tora's feet while she sleeps!
111222121211211.content:
"Right time for bed, slave!" Tora stands up so that she stares down at you. "We have a big day tomorrow after all..."

You feel an undeniable surge of excitement: you haven't shared a bed with Tora for over a year...maybe there could even be a reward in this for you!

"Let's go." Tora goes into the bathroom and starts to brush her teeth, while you hover around her, feeling a little useless. Ignoring you for now, she finishes getting ready - wiping off some make up, flossing, and several other things that always bemused you that girls needed to do for some reason.

Finally, you follow Tora into her bedroom. Automatically, you begin to hop into the left side of the bed, which where you would always sleep next to her when you were dating.

"What do you think you're doing?" Tora stands in front of you with both hands on her hips. She uses a finger to point down at the floor. "That's where you're sleeping, slave!"

You're disappointed, not that you'd show it. It actually does seem quite fair thinking about it - you are her slave after all!

"Yes, mistress," you say meekly, shuffling down on the floor and lying on it. You don't have the guts to ask her for a pillow or duvet.

"Good boy," Tora says, chuckling slightly. "I think this is gonna work - you just can't say no to me can you? We are gonna be so happy!" She sighs contentedly as she throws her clothes onto the floor. You consider wrenching your head up to chance a look at her in her underwear, or maybe even naked, but you think better of it. It's only been a couple of hours and you're already well-trained!

"You can use those to sleep on by the way, as a reward," Tora calls, a little tiredly from above you. "As it's your first day at my work tomorrow you're gonna need some sleep!"

"Thank you, mistress," you reply automatically. You gather together Tora's top and dress and consider what do with them.

"Sniff them first," Tora orders you.

Complying, you inhale deeply Tora's sweet strawberry-like scent, which causes you to sigh slightly. There's no point pretending now that you're not completely infatuated with your new mistress!

Giggling, Tora rolls over so that her face appears at the end of the bed. "Aw, maybe I've been too kind to my slave!" She winks at you.

Uncertain whether to proceed or not, you decide to not overdo things too much. You fold over the top as a makeshift pillow and use her dress as a blanket.

Still giggling and watching you with amusement, Tora continues. "Aw but now you have nothing to sniff! Hang on slave.." She rummages on the other side of the bed and rolls back over with a pair of white sweat socks in her hand. "There you go, you lucky slave!"

"Th-thank you mistress," you stammer as the pair of dirty socks are thrown into your face. Almost immediately you begin sniffing deeply her foot sweat. The wonderfully musty and cheesy scent fills your nostrils and makes you moan with pleasure.

"Have fun, slave," Tora laughs as she turns off the light and within minutes begins to snore gently.

You however are wide awake with her socks covering your nose. Realising that she is asleep, you decide to...
111222121211211.title: It's time for bed!

choices: Accept the position and sign the documents
1112221212112111.content:
Maybe it's out of loyalty for your mistress not to do anything subversive while she sleeps, or it could be that you are simply exhausted. Either way, you move her dirty socks away from your face (somewhat reluctantly) and find that your eyes are rather droopy. Moments later you are fast asleep, on the floor next to your mistress' bed.

....

"Wake up!" You feel some discomfort in your ribs. Opening your eyes groggily, you see the gorgeous Tora standing over you, a smirk on her face and a foot protruding into your side. She is wearing a small tight t-shirt and shorts. Your heart flutters a little at her beautiful appearance.

Before you can even say "morning", she continues. "We've got to do something about your snoring. Maybe I should make you sleep somewhere else..."

You can't help yourself. "No...please...!"

She giggles. "Well if you're a good slave today, then maybe I will let you stay there. Maybe," she repeats warningly at your sigh of relief.

Staring up at your ex girlfriend now mistress, a slightly conflicted feeling starts to spread inside of you. Last night, giving in to her and pretty much signing your life away became increasingly easy. In the cold light of day, you can't deny the pangs of regret you have. No more Lizzie - what on Earth must she think? No apartment, no phone, no credit card, no job...you reel off each of the things you have sacrificed in order to become Tora's slave.

"Even though it's a Saturday, we're going into work today. Some of the senior managers - including me," she says a little pompously, "are going to be in, and I've already messaged them to arrange an interview. The CEO won't be there though - he's away on holiday or something."

"An interview?" You ask her, a little stupidly.

"Oh, slave! It's a good job I'm doing all the thinking and decision-making isn't it; imagine if you were left in charge of that! An interview for you - for your new job." Still with her foot pushed against your ribs, you continue to lie on the floor as realisation dawns. Of course! She told you about how she would fix you a position at her work. A position that pretty much meant menial tasks for you...

"So get up and get ready. You're gonna have to wear the clothes you have on, but don't worry, the job you're going to get doesn't involve you really impressing anyone. The interview is just a formality really, just so we can confirm that you aren't a total weirdo and get you to sign a few documents..."

There is something soothing about someone else deciding everything for you, but the pangs of guilt and uncertainty continue to fester inside of you. However, your infatuation mixed with the genuine inferiority you feel for Tora is undeniable and outweighs any reservations you have, at present.

In around half an hour, Tora and you leave her apartment together. She orders you to drive her to work, even though she smirks at you while doing so. "You can manage that, right?" She asks you disdainfully. Walking behind her, arriving at her place of work is a humbling experience. Thankfully, for today it is relatively deserted, as Tora explained it would be before.

"Sit there," she instructs you, as you take a seat in one of the meeting rooms and nervously wait for the senior managers to arrive. Three ladies, two of which are approximately in their early 30s and one who is probably in her mid to late forties look at you with slight amusement as they enter the room and sit in chairs facing opposite you. They all look rather intimidating with their business suits and smart shoes. Tora, forcing herself to look professional and serious, joins them.

"Okay...you must be Ross, correct?" The eldest of the ladies begins.

"Er, yep," you answer her uncomfortably.

"My name is Samantha. Here are my colleagues, Jennifer and Maggie. And you know Tora, already." Tora manages to suppress a smirk.

"Now this is not so much a formal interview," one of the others, with short blonde hair continues. "More of a...confirmation that you are going to be Tora's new...assistant."

All four ladies exchange subtle smiles at his. "So, let me just outline some of your duties," the same senior manager continues. "You will make coffee, open letters, seal envelopes, put stamps on envelopes, make more coffee...basically we promised Tora with her promotion that she could get an assistant, if she could find someone who would be willing to work for very little money with very menial tasks."

Tora smiles across at the others. "Managers have to have some perks, right?"

They chuckle. The manager who hasn't yet spoken continues. "As Maggie was saying, we just need to know that you are happy with your role and get you to sign some paperwork." She smiles at you, somewhat patronisingly. This must be Jennifer, you muse. She has long brown hair, deep brown eyes and is extremely attractive, if more than a little full of herself.

"So," Samantha says. "First of all we need you to confirm that you accept this position. Your salary will be starting at ten dollars for a complete, nine to five day's work. Of course your manager," she looks across at Tora, "has the right to add or deduct from that as necessary."

You gulp. This is so humiliating! Not only are you being offered a ridiculously rubbish job, but it will be for absolute pittance, from which Tora will probably take all or most of anyway.

Looking across at them, their expressions range from amusement to mild contempt. They must really you think that you are a real no-hoper to accept this terrible position they are offering you. Can you really bring yourself to accept it and sign a contract? Then again, if you don't, what Tora might say or do fills you with fear and dread...
1112221212112111.title: Getting some sleep then into Tora's work...

choices: Start your job by very boring tasks: stamps on envelopes, shredding etc!
Fast forward to a month later...
11122212121121111.content:
Tora has bent you to her will so much already. Accepting the offer seems to be the only way of pleasing her. It's made even easier by the fact that the three ladies sitting alongside Tora all seem to have a naturally domineering nature about them.

"Yeah...I mean...I accept," you mutter awkwardly, shifting your gaze to the floor when you notice triumphant smirks appear on each of their faces.

"Excellent!" Says Samantha, rushing over to you with some paperwork and a pen. "Now all you have to do is sign your name at the end of each of the pages. I wouldn't worry too much about all the small print," she says a touch patronisningly. "Tora will summarise it all to you anyway."

You do as she says, signing each page, with a mixture of humiliation and grudging acceptance that this is what you are agreeing to be, officially. Tora's assistant. Her lackey; her bitch! One of the worst things is how pathetic Samantha and the others must think you are. It's almost comforting to know that Tora owns you, but having others witness it is not going to be so easy to get used to.

"Well, now that's done, I'm going to get back to some work for a few hours. I know we don't normally work Saturdays but there are several meetings I want to prepare for," one of the other women - Maggie - states. The others echo similar sentiments and depart, saying goodbye to Tora and giving you a dismissive wave of the hand as they walk past you.

Left alone with Tora, you actually feel relieved to be in just her company again.

"Well done, slave," she says, grinning at you. "You seem to be learning well: do exactly what I tell you and you'll prove to me some use to me!"

"Thank you mistress," you say meekly, staring back at the floor as you don't feel you have the nerve to look her in the eye. You allow yourself to stare at her smart business shoes, finding that you feel a yearning to see her bare feet again.

"And signing all the pages without reading them...that was a great move! I'm not sure if you would have done had you actually read them. You see..." She leans forward a little. "If you try to leave this job or even miss a day's work, you will be fucked. The implications for you would be severe! The penalty you would have to pay...let's just say that savings account you've had for years - you still have it right?" You nod. "Well that would save your bacon for a short while at least! Just do what I tell you and you'll be fine," she chuckles.

Is this all really worth it? A small nagging voice inside of you seems to say. The spell and power that Tora has over you is far, far, greater then any vestiges of pride or resistance that you still hold.

"Now, I want to stay here for a good few hours - for just longer than the others. Looks good, you see," she explains. "That gives you a chance to start your new exciting career!" She enthuses. "Now where shall we start...?"
11122212121121111.title: Signing the documents and sealing your fate...

choices: Samantha!
Jennifer!
111222121211211111.content:
After being told by Tora of what mundane duties you would have to carry out, you are directed towards a few huge piles of letters. Tora leaves the room with a smirk, instructing you to get this done within two hours. Following that, a whole filing cabinet's worth of shredding...your new job really does suck! Still, you did sign the papers, you think ruefully to yourself. A slightly more comforting feeling enters your mind, as you lick the first envelope - at least you'll be licking your mistress' sexy feet instead of these stationery items after work!

"Oh and don't forget my coffee. Get some for the others too," Tora instructs you after briefly popping her head into your room. You nod up at her - not having a chair and being forced to sit on the floor while you lick the envelopes only makes you feel more lowly!

A slightly sickening feeling enters your stomach; having to make coffee for Samantha and the others is bound to be a demeaning and degrading experience. You've made coffee for your superiors at other jobs before, but never as a hopeless lackey, who is already blatantly viewed as little more than my dirt!

Hastily making Tora's coffee first and dropping it off to her (she barely acknowledges you, which is admittedly quite hurtful), you steel yourself to ask the other managers. Asking each of them is a humbling experience, especially as they smirk at you or give you patronising instructions, like "Don't forget to stir in the sugar properly!" Or "Skimmed milk - that's low fat, you know that right?!" Anyway, you oblige and deliver the cups of coffee to them, almost feeling relieved that you haven't had to experience too embarrassing!

Returning to your endless envelope task, you focus on licking as many as possible: if you can get this lot done, and begin the shredding within two hours, then Tora may even be impressed! You sigh inwardly at how low your stock has fallen in less than twenty four hours.

After one of the seven huge piles is complete - three quarters of an hour have already passed - you suddenly notice one of the managers is standing at the door. You know from the footwear that it's not Tora...as you raise your head upwards, you see that it is...
111222121211211111.title: Stationery tedium. And coffee!

1112221212112111111.content:
"Oh, hey. Get me another coffee, Rod," Samantha tells you, apparently having forgotten your name already.

Keen to please her - she seems like the overall boss at Tora's office - you abandon the piles of envelopes and get to it. For a second you think of correcting her but a steely look from her keeps you quiet.

Returning to her office with the coffee, the blonde, middle-aged woman observes you shrewdly.

"So, Rod," she says taking a sip and nodding approvingly. "I was thinking. You wanna earn some extra cash here?"

"Well, I..I..." You stammer, taken by surprise.

She considers you for a moment. "You seem to be...devoted to Tora, well the company here. That's commendable. I was just thinking, the cleaning company we use - it's expensive. There're all sorts of politics...I won't bore you with the details. Basically, after you've done your 9 to 5 with Tora, how would you like to get some more money - by being the janitor?"

The janitor?! It's humiliating to hear her offer this to you as though it should be tempting!

"I mean, the pay is low, but you'll be working from 5pm till 10pm. It's five hours on top of what you're doing," she explains as if you're stupid and couldn't have worked this out! The rate of pay for those five hours is more than you're currently getting..."

The more the blonde woman talks, the more you realise that you'll pretty much agree with anything she says. She's smart, confident and attractive for an older lady. You don't stand a chance! Signing a couple of forms, she smiles at you. "Great! Now, bring me another coffee in two hours."

Telling Tora about your extra job incenses her. Your Mistress is livid with you, outraged that you would agree to something without her consent! She makes it crystal clear to you that there'll be no foot action for you, not for at least a month!

So, on top of doing menial tasks all day at the office, you now spend an additional five hours, cleaning, hopping, hoovering, cleaning and bleaching the toilets, emptying the garbage...you are so exhausted that by the time you get back to Tora's you head straight to bed - the broom closet. Then you're up an hour earlier than Tora to get as many household chores done as possible before she rises and is ready to go to work with you.

It's not much of a life really! Plus, the extra money you get for being the office janitor goes straight to Tora. The way you see it is that you're paying homage to her, for allowing you to serve her. Maybe, if you're lucky, she'll allow you just to smell, or even see her bare feet earlier than a month. That's as much as you've got to look forward to from now on!
1112221212112111111.title: Samantha!

choices: Agree and tell Jennifer you will do whatever she wants!
Tell her no - you can't betray Tora like this!
1112221212112111112.content:
"Hello Ross," says the voice of a slender figure as your eyes raise up to meet hers.

"Uh...hey...uh..." Your voice trails off, the name of this hot brunette of a manager drawing a blank.

"Jennifer," she sighs contemptuously, closing the door behind her. "Names not really your strong point, right? Then again, what exactly are you good at?"

You feel your cheeks reddening. Jennifer may be drop-dead gorgeous; you actually find it difficult to maintain your gaze into her chocolate-brown, alluring eyes. Lowering your head, to the ground, to her black high heels which fit onto her tanned legs and feet, you can't help but feel completely inferior. Especially as there's nothing you can say that springs to mind...

"Um...er....computers," you finally mumble at her feet.

"Computers, huh? So you like playing around on them or actually have some useful skills?" Jennifer says disdainfully down at you

You think for a moment. It would look mighty suspicious if Jennifer (or anyone for that matter other than Tora at your new workplace) knew that you were actually talented and more than proficient at computer programming! Letting this slip would potentially make things awkward for Tora, especially if she had to explain why someone with your skills is satisfied with your rock bottom expectations, pay and job prospects...

"Just...er...playing," you say meekly, wishing that this attractive manager would be satisfied witht that.

"Thought so. So you're happy to be Tora's little lackey? To basically be an errand boy to her?" She clicks her fingers at you so you are forced to look up at her slender, sexy frame.

"Yes," you state, as firmly as possible.

"This is so typical!" She says, her voice rising. "Tora gets a promotion and gets an assistant who is willing to do all the crap that no one else will! I honestly didn't think she would ever find someone who would meet the criteria Samantha set out for her! And me," she pauses for a moment as you stare up at her, feeling a mixture of both fear and arousal for this feisty woman. "And me...just because my last four assistants have all happened to have resigned...I get told that I have to wait three months for a review before I'm given another one!"

How do you react? Jennifer is clearly pissed off with the fact that Tora has a willing, devoted assistant - well, slave admittedly - whereas she does not! Before you can even consider what to say, she continues...

"Anyway, I don't think it's fair that I have to wait another three months while Tora gets to parade her lapdog around. Do you?" She stares at you challengingly.

"Er...no," you reply the only logical and safe answer!

"Exactly! So I'm going to...use you. When I need you. And don't worry, Ross, Tora won't need to know anything about this. And it will only be for three months. What do you say?" She sounds almost soothing as she gives you a confident smile.

Can you really refuse this brunette stunner, who you sense could make your life really difficult for you if she wanted! But to betray Tora's trust like this...what should you do?
1112221212112111112.title: Jennifer!

choices: The next day at work....
It's impossible!
11122212121121111121.content:
Simply put, Jennifer is impossible to resist! Not having the stones to refuse her, you nod meekly, making her grin.

"That's the kind of attitude I'm looking for! A 'can do' approach! Now, like I said, Tora won't need to know a thing about this. I'm very discreet." She gives you a wink, which makes you blush. Jennifer is so gorgeous, she may even be more attractive than Tora!

"OK," the beautiful brunette continues. "Here's what I'd like you to do..."

She proceeds to explain various tasks, which will become part of your daily routine. Rattling of a list including shredding, filing, making off, organising files...you can't help but wonder how you'll be able to perform your duties for Tora too. Jennifer seems to sense your anxiety, tilting her head to one side and pouting at you, her brown ponytail flicking around.

"Aw, you worried about doing a good job for Tora still, hun. It's just the way of the world - dominant women like Tora and I are gonna take advantage of guys like you. Just accept that for the next few months you're gonna be having it tough. Don't worry - you'll get used to it. And like I said, Tora won't know that I'm sharing you with her....it will be fine!" She says, a mixture of arrogance and reassurance in her voice.

It has the desired effect, you mutter a quick thanks, which makes her look rather pityingly at you. Anyway, you know that you have to make a start on Jennifer's tasks, then ensure that you keep up with what Tora has instructed you to do...

It proves even harder than you thought! You spread your time between your two 'bosses' - trying to juggle the various menial tasks that they have set you. After spending two straight hours completing Jennifer's final job, leaving the brunette satisfied and able to leave work a little early. Tora is furious with you when you rush back into her office, at approximately 5 o'clock, demanding what the hell you've been doing. You make up some lame excuses but she doesn't buy it.

"NO feet for you tonight!" She hisses, making sure that no one can hear. "I'm working on a Saturday and you knew I had loads to get underway with my new role! You are fucking useless!"

"Please..." You whine at her. "Please, I'll get better. Let me make it up to you."

She stares at you with contempt, chewing her lip thoughtfully. "Fine. You will stay at the office - I'll lend you my key - until all of your tasks are done. I don't care if you have to stay here until 8 o'clock. Or later! Do you know how embarrassing it will be if people notice my new assistant has slacked on the first day?!" Her hazel eyes have fire dancing inside them, making you tremble. "Now, get everything done. When you get in tonight, I'll leave the door ope so that you can crawl into the broom closet and sleep there - I won't want to see you! If, when I come in on Monday, and everything's how I want it, then...then that means I will let you SMELL my feet...after work on Monday."

Completely overawed by your mistress, you humbly agree with everything she has said, apologising for your ineptitude. She sweeps out of the office, tossing you her keys without another glance at you. Sighing, you wonder if you'll be able to keep this up...can you practically be an assistant for both Tora and Jennifer?
11122212121121111121.title: Jennifer's new assistant!

choices: No it doesn't...uh oh!
111222121211211111211.content:
The next morning, Tora gives you approval for all of the jobs you completed last night. She makes it very clear to you though that she's not letting that happen again. You will do your tasks in her office; she even creates a tiny desk area for you to sit at! Perhaps she's caught wind that one of the other women in the office is employing your services too...

What this means though is that there is a one seriously pissed off Jennifer! She sweeps into Tora's office, explaining that Samantha wants a word with her. Using this as an opportunity to talk to you, she shakes her head at you, a cross her expression on her face.

"Yesterday you did so well! But it's nearly lunch time and I haven't had a single coffee yet! The files are piling up - when are you gonna do it exactly?" The gorgeous brunette is even more sexy when she's angry, you notice. Stammering excuses, you 'fess up and admit that you can't get her work done as Tora is keeping a close eye on you.

"So you're telling me you can't be my assistant too, basically?" She narrows her eyes at you. At that moment you both hear footsteps coming towards you. Jennifer suddenly smirks at you, as she mouths 'warned you!'.

"Oh, hi," Tora says, surprised that Jennifer's still here. "Samantha wasn't there."

"I said NO, you creep!" Jennifer says with disgust at you, ignoring Tora. "I can't believe that you would proposition me like that - that's totally out of order!"

Tora looks sharply at you. "Ross, what did you say to her?"

"I didn't...I...I..." You bluster, flabbergasted that Jennifer would do this.

"Leave this with me - don't worry, I'll make sure this is taken care of," Tora tells Jennifer, who nods at her, shooting you a look of utter distaste as she leaves.

"Tora...I..." You begin, but the blonde woman cuts you off.

"Don't worry, I know Jennifer," she says, taking you by surprise. "She's got a terrible track record of assistants. She's had, like three, in the last few months. Anyway, tell me exactly what's been happening..."

You do, explaining how Jennifer accosted you and overwhelmed you into becoming her assistant too. Tora's not impressed with you, in fact she's furious that you kept this a secret, yet it gives her an idea.

"You know, play this right and this could turn out very well for me. Jennifer's the next person up from me in this company....her job could be mine! Here's what I want you to do..."

Your mistress explains that she wants you to go to straight to Samantha, explaining exactly what happened, embellishing a few details such as the brunette groping you, promising you sex...it means that there'll be an enquiry into her; with her track record with assistants, Tora thinks there's a good chance she could be axed! You still will be punished for being dishonest with her, but reporting everything to Samantha like your mistress has said, will certainly lessen the punishment and means you will be allowed to worship her feet very soon...

In Samantha's office, you tell the middle-aged blonde woman exactly what Tora told you, including the fictional parts about the sexual promises.

Samantha looks skeptically at you. "What evidence do you have for any of this...what's your name again?"

"Ross. And I, er, I don't. But it's what she told me!" You retort.

She still looks doubtful. "So it's your word against hers. Yours - Tora's assistant on his second day here, and Jennifer who has served this company well for five years."

You get her point. "I, well, Jennifer has had three different assistants...all of them fired...doesn't it seem...odd?" You say bravely, taking Samantha back a little.

"Tora told you this, right?" Samantha says, a look that tells you she's figured it all out now. You nod. She makes a phone call, waving you out of her office. Standing around like a lemon, you decide to return to Tora's office instead. On your way, you see your mistress walking towards you, pleased that you told Samantha everything.

"Good boy!" She pats your head. "Samantha's just called me...it could be my second promotion in just a couple of days...happy days!"

Does it all work out for Tora, as she has hoped?
111222121211211111211.title: The next day at work....

choices: The aftermath...
1112221212112111112111.content:
"Just wait outside her office - hopefully it will be good news when I'm out again!" Tora grins, winking at you as she walks away.

You do so, following your mistress before taking a seat outside Samantha's office, which is grander than both Tora's and Jennifer's.

"Oh, look who it is!" Jennifer smirks at you. She looks through the window of Samantha's office. "Tora telling the boss what you did, huh? Waiting to hand in your notice I guess?"

For a moment you feel like taking her a peg or two down, but the confident expression on her pretty face makes you lose your nerve. That would be pretty stupid anyway! Samantha pops her head out suddenly. "Jennifer, come in please."

The brunette smiles as she follows her boss in, probably assuming that she wants to hear the events of you harassing her...how wrong she is! The minutes tick by. How long does this take? Then again, Jennifer has been at the company for years, so it can't be easy explaining the inquiry that will take place...

The door finally opens, Tora storms out, not even looking at you. Samantha and Jennifer walk out together, asking you to join them.

"Well, this is a difficult position. On the one hand we have what you told us, about Jennifer..." Samantha says, nodding at her colleague.

"On the other, we have Tora - fiercely ambitious. Too the point that she will do and say anything to gain power. Or tell someone to say anything... To me, it comes down to who I can trust the most out of the two of them. I choose Jennifer," the blonde woman explains.

An uneasy feeling swirls inside your belly. That's why Tora looked so pissed off....what does this mean for her...for you?

Jennifer takes over, a look of sympathy in her wide, almost alien-like eyes. "Ross, we know why you said those things about me - Tora made you right? It's OK. Tell us if that's the case and it'll mean that you can keep your job. In fact, it means that you'll be my own personal assistant - to prove to Samantha here and everyone that I treat assistants well. It also means a pay rise for you too..."

You can't betray Tora like this, you can't! Before you speak, Samantha adds a bit more. "Just to make it clear, Ross - it is Ross, right? Just to make it clear to you, Tora is done, finished. She is being let go - she will blame you, whether you accept what Jennifer's said or not. This is strictly business here. You proving your loyalty to Jennifer, to the company will go a long way. If you don't agree with everything Jennifer just said, it means you lose your job, no chance again of working anywhere worthwhile - your record will be destroyed - and Tora will take it all out on you. Is that what you want?"

Well when she puts it like that... "No, no I don't want that," you say, feeling panicked.

Samantha smiles. "Good, so you're going on record to say that Tora made up those things..." The blonde gets you to recall everything, using Jennifer's version of the truth. You go along with it all, having realised that Tora is done with you now, either way. "Great! So, you can go with Jennifer to her office and get things settled. I'll talk to Tora now..."

Following Jennifer out of the room, you still feel conflicted. Jennifer senses this too as you sit down in her office, opposite your new boss.

"I get it. You've been Tora's little plaything but it's backfired. I won't hold a grudge against you for ratting me out, but I need complete loyalty from you - not like how you've been to Tora. If anyone else here tries to use you, you tell them straight away that you're mine. Got it?"

Nodding weakly, the beautiful brunette looks satisfied. It's clear that she's used to getting what she want, and she has no issues stepping on Tora.
1112221212112111112111.title: No it doesn't...uh oh!

"You are a spineless little traitor, that's what you are," Tora spits at you.

It's gonna be doing the rounds on social media; everyone will know soon enough..! Oh, and good luck finding a place to stay...you'd forgotten you sold your apartment, right?"

You plead with your eyes, hoping that she'll change her mind but Tora slinks away. Jennifer gives you a curious look but shrugs it off, continuing with item 15 on your list...

Later that day, when you're dutifully working away on a filing job for Jennifer, she beckons you to sit down. Showing you her phone, you cringe at the sight. "When did you upload this? And is it true?"

"I didn't...Tora must've...I don't have my phone," you babble, wincing as Jennifer shakes her head at you.

"But you have a foot fetish, right? That's the secret she was talking about?" The brunette raises her narrow, perfectly plucked eyebrows at you. Knowing there's no point denying it, you agree. Everyone is going to know your secret; everyone will think you're a freak...

Jennifer shrugs. "No big deal. Just means that you'll be even more devoted to me, right?" You're so grateful to her - your new boss could have berated you, humiliated you...your devotion to her increases right there and then.

Where you live becomes a difficult one. None of your friends want to help you, after your so-called post on Facebook does the round, being shared, reposted, put on Snap chat, Instagram, emailed around.... you have literally nowhere to go! There is a very basic, slum-like apartment block where hopeless cases stay at, paying on a weekly basis. Resigned to the fact that you're going to have a pretty basic existence now, you are allowed to sign up for a month, on the understanding that you'll pay an extra 15% at the end of the month, when you get paid.

There are plenty of unsavoury characters around. Unfortunately, several of the girls, eighteen year olds who have banded together as they are all from broken homes recognise your face from Social Media. You quickly become their helpless foot slave, being allowed to lick their feet clean and sleeping on the foot of your bed that they share at night. In return, you cook them meals and do everything you tell them. After your first paycheque, you pay the rent for your room, then have the rest taken by the teenage girls. They buy alcohol and have an all night party, while you, broken and hopeless now meekly serve at their feet.

Work soon becomes the highlight of your life. Jennifer is demanding but so, so beautiful. Now she knows you have a fetish, she deliberately works barefoot, making your mouth water every time you're near them. She doesn't let you worship them or even get too near to them, knowing that she has to prove to Samantha that she can do a good job with assistants - it would be too risky to have you at her feet. Maybe one day, once the scandal involving Tora has died down.

Every time you lick the nasty feet clean of the teenagers who you serve the rest of the time you're not working, you imagine them being Jennifer's gorgeous, soft soles. You still fantasise about Tora too and are sorry for how things have turned out, even though she has now essentially ruined you!

Still, you are privileged enough to be Jennifer's assistant - that's enough to keep you going!

To make things even trickier, Tora insists that you spend the next three hours in her office to complete various shredding, scanning and filing tasks. It's a target, an aim to for you - be the perfect house slave and you'll get to do what you truly do best in life again...

Serve your ex girlfriend's feet!

"Ross, this is just weird," Lizzie says slowly, her brow furrowed. "Why would you do that?" A couple of girls a blonde and a brunette, who are walking past, stop and eavesdrop in to your conversation.

"Lizzie, let's go inside and..." Your voice trails off as Lizzie gives you a firm look. "No, I wanna know right now why you have what looks like hundreds of girls' dirty socks!"

One of the girls, a teenager of around sixteen pulls a disgusted face. "Ew! That's gross! Like, why would you do that?"

Lizzie gives her a look but then glowers at you. "She's right. It is weird."

"Yeah," the other one chimes in. "I mean, why would a guy have a bag of dirty socks. Are you, like, a total pervert or something?"

You stare at each of them, completely at a loss for words. "No, no. It's not..." you begin feebly but the girls roll their eyes and turn to Lizzie.

"This guy is some kinda freak. Just dump his ass already!" One says.

Lizzie stares at you, shaking her head. "To be honest, it's not looking good, Ross. Until you have a clear and honest explanation, I want nothing to do with you." With that the brunette goes back to her car and drives away, her tires screeching.

One of the teenage girls smirks at you. "Hey, sock guy, have these too!" She laughs as she slips off her shoes and wrenches her socks off, dropping them in the bag. Her friend does the same, both giving you a smug look as they stand before you, barefoot. "Meet us here tomorrow with our socks clean or we're gonna tell everyone we know that you're some kinda freak!"

"You don't even...know me...!" You call out at them as they slink away. "I'm NOT washing your socks!"

The blonde turns around, a look of triumph on her pretty, yet hard features. "I've got your number plate, freak." She says gloatingly, taking a photo of your car. Think it'll be pretty easy for us to look you up and spread the word!"

They've got you. Feeling completely dejected, you turn away from them, ignoring their catty laughter as you lug the massive bag of dirty socks - now with two more pairs - to wash. You could take them to the launderette, but not only would that arouse suspicion from whoever is there, it's the subservience you feel towards Tora, Beth and now these two teenagers that makes you feel compelled to be a good 'sock loser' and lick them clean yourself....
113112111112111211111.title: Tora calls you back - thank her sister!

choices: Downward Spiral
1131121111121112111111.content:
You wake up in your bed, covered with dirty socks. Shit! You must have fallen asleep still licking them. Why the hell have you allowed yourself to be in this position. Checking the time, you need to leave for work soon. But if you don't get these done, Tora will be pissed...plus you need to make sure you meet the two girls with their clean socks...

There's only one thing for it, you put the remaining dirty socks - at least a couple of hundred - into your washing up bowl and pour in hot water. You do this several times over so that every conceivable area to hang them out to dry is used - backs of chairs, the edges of your coffee table, the end and sides of your bed, on coat hangers....everywhere! Realising you're now late for work, you rush there, and offer an apology to your boss, knowing that you can't let this happen again.

"Busy morning, huh?" Your coworker, Amanda smiles at you. You used to, and still admittedly do, have a huge crush on her. You've fantasised about her feet many times and shift your eyes down to notice that her flats have slipped off, revealing cute black socks.

"I said, busy morning, Ross?" Amanda grins, almost as if she knows you're rather smitten with her.

"Er, yeah," you mutter, trying to focus on the work you have to catch up on. You remember asking out the beautiful brunette around year or ago, before you dated Lizzie. She was matter-of-fact in rejecting you; it's made you feel inferior to her ever since.

"Well, don't let it happen too often now. That big promotion's coming up and I want at least some competition! Everyone knows you and I are the only ones skilled and qualified enough to even go for it..."

She's right. No one else would even bother applying. It's a straight fight between the two of them. You're the more skilled programmer, though she is more creative and persuasive than you. Busying yourself with your work, the hours at work trickle along you realise that it's only an hour or so before you need to get the socks - all dried - to Tora. And those teenage girls...

Making an excuse to Amanda that you need to see your Dad in hospital - the same lie you told Lizzie - you slip away, asking her not to tell the boss. She rolls her eyes at you but agrees. You can't risk missing out on this promotion - late starting and early finishing would be too much!

Getting back to yours in a hurry, you collate the socks and pair them up together in the huge sack, relieved they are all dry and clean enough, then head down to your car.

"Hey sock guy!" A bratty voice rings across to you. Turning around, you see the two girls from yesterday, both wearing smirks on their faces.

You glower at them. "I know, I know you want your socks. Don't call me-"

"Sock guy?" The brunette giggles at you. "Well, that's what you are - SOCK GUY!"

"OK...ssh!" You plead with her, hoping no one else heard.

"Whatever," the blonde rolls her eyes. "Just give us the socks already..."

You open the bag and look for their socks. There are so many to sort through, you genuinely get confused with which is which. Why didn't you separate these out beforehand, in case the girls showed?!

"Come on, sock guy!" One of the girls says in a mocking tone.

"It's just...which socks are yours?" You say, gulping and hating how useless you are.

The girls smirk. "Oooh, let us have a look..." Before you can stop them, the girls search through, taking any pairs of socks that they like the look of - all sorts of colours and materials. You try to intervene but it's too late. The teenage girls giggle as they run off with armfuls of socks.

"Thanks sock guy!" They call out happily as they depart with what must be at least twenty pairs of socks between them. You get in your car and attempt to give chase but they skip down a nearby alley so you've lost sight of them. Cursing them, you check your phone. You wince as your read a message from Lizzie...

Nothing to say? Well that's it - we're done. Have fun with your dirty socks.

The next one is from Tora:

Expecting you here in ten minutes, sock bitch. Don't be late!

Not wasting another second, you get to Tora's in the nick of time. Standing at her door, your heart races with trepidation...will she notice that a chunk of the socks are missing.

Of course she will!

"What the hell is this?" Her grin turns to a scowl as she opens the bags and counts the pairs. "There's at least forty socks missing." She stares at you expectantly.

"I, er, they got...stolen," you say weakly, hanging your head in shame.

"Stolen? By who?" She says, exasperated.

"A couple of...teenage girls," you murmur, humiliated beyond words.

"Well, you've screwed up. Totally." Tora narrows her eyes as she stands over you, making you shift your attention to the floor, at her feet. "I can't trust you ever again, loser. From now on, you'll give me the thousand dollars per month that you would have been paying PLUS another thousand for screwing things up. At the end of this month I need TWO thousand dollars from you. Fail to pay me and I tell everyone I know that not only do you have a freaky foot fetish, but you actually paid me to lick girls' socks! Now, you got all that?" She shakes her head contemptuously at you.

"Yeah...yeah....sorry," you say humbly, attempting to place a kiss on the top of her foot.

"Uh...no fucking way," she says pulling both feet away from you. "You will only get to kiss my feet at the end of each month once you've brought me the two thousand. Now go the fuck away." She slams the door on you, leaving you completely broken.
1131121111121112111111.title: The next day...

choices: The Aftermath
11311211111211121111111.content:
Having your girlfriend break up with you, ex girlfriend blackmail you into a much worse deal, plus being taken advantage of by two teenage girls, you feel like things can't get any worse.

When you get home, you check your work email, only for your heart to sink further as you read a message from Amanda:

Dear Ross,

The boss caught wind that you left early today - I tried to stick up for you but he wouldn't listen. They interviewed me for the position and I got it! They actually were thinking of letting you go, calling you 'dead weight'. I fought your corner and convinced them to keep you on as my assistant. So you'll be directly under me, under the same salary you had. See me in the morning so I can talk you through some new projects I've thought of.

Kind regards,

Amanda Tothill
Senior Programming Advisor


Amanda's assistant? This is the last thing you needed! Forking over pretty much your entire salary to Tora is an absolute disaster. Had you got the promotion at work, which Amanda now has, you could have got buy. It was a 50% increase, something you desperately needed! You don't bother replying to Amanda, resolving that you'll talk to her in the morning. As you go to bed, you consider messaging Tora but think better of it; any risk of pissing her off would only make you get blackmailed more! As the image of her, and her sister's feet pop into your head, you feel your dick stiffen and find yourself masturbating to the thought of them, humiliating as it is.

When you arrive at work - bang on time - the next morning, the boss merely grunts at you. Walking over to your work station, you try not to grimace at Amanda's new office, with her name and position already on the door.

"Ross! Come in!" She calls over at you as she spots you walking past. You do so, trying your best to ignore how frustrating this is.

Amanda smiles as you sit down opposite her desk, finishing off her latte. "So, no hard feelings?"

You stare at her, open-mouthed. "No hard feelings?!" You say incredulously.

"Yeah. I've managed to save your job. You got my email right? Anyway, I'm glad that you're my assistant - it's good to know I have someone who knows what's what and can help me make some positive changes, start new projects..."

What can you say? Amanda has either played you very, very well or is being truthful. Either way you reluctantly accept that you'll be directly working under her now.

"I mean, I know it's awkward, us being at the same level, now me being essentially your boss..." A smirk flickers on her face but she hides it quickly. "Anyway, a few things for you to remember. Make a note of these...."

Amanda reels of a few day-to-day tasks she wants you to do. She expects a cafe latte on her desk first thing, before she arrives, which means you getting to work before your scheduled hours. Along with your regular programming duties, she needs you to make a start on a new project, plus pick up her lunch and coffee at midday..."

"Am I your errand boy too, then?" You say, forcing yourself to stay polite.

She smiles. "Well, in your amended contract it basically says you will do anything I tell you. If it means get me a coffee, you get me a coffee. If I need you to stay late to finish off some work, you'll do it. If I need my dog walking, then you'll walk her. Oh, that reminds me - Fifi needs two walks a day: one at 11am and again at 3pm. Don't worry - she's in my office so you don't have to pick her up from anywhere. Saves money I was paying that dog walker! Oh, you will need to pick up...well, you know..." Amanda gestures towards where Fifi, a haughty looking poodle is sitting in the corner of the room, doggy bags and a pooper scooper already next to her bed.

"And if I don't...don't want all these....tasks?" You ask her, feelingly increasingly helpless.

She raises her eyebrows. "You don't want to work for me, Ross? I thought we were friends? I thought you liked me?"

"I do, I do!" You say quickly, flushing red. "It's just...get you coffee....walk your dog?"

She beams at you. "You'll be just great. I mean," she lowers her voice. "If you don't accept and sign, then you're basically out of a job with a...pretty rotten reference."

Realising that it's too risky to be unemployed, especially with Tora's two thousand dollar blackmail fee per month hanging over you, you quietly nod and sign the contract.

"Excellent!" Amanda beams. "Now, first thing to do..."

For the rest of the day, you dutifully follow Amanda's instructions, reporting back to her regularly, taking out Fifi as instructed, getting her lunch and coffee...it's exhausting to keep on top of it all, but you manage to do so. Amanda sits at her desk, making the odd phone call and approving any emails from her that you type first. She's got it very cushy - basically supervising you and several others, though you're the only one that seems to be doing her errands. Others pick up on this, smirking when they see you taking Fifi out for her second walk, pooper scooper in your hand.

Amanda seems to be a natural at giving orders and delegating. She gets universal praise from everyone, and even you have to admit that she's better at the job then you ever could be. At the end of the day, you sit exhausted at your desk as she comes over to you.

"Oh Ross, one more thing before you go. Can you polish my shoes for me? The black polish is on my desk. I leave the shoes under my desk, so they're all ready for tomorrow," She slips off her work flats, handing them to you and puts on some trainers. "I'm going to Le Zumba! See you tomorrow and well done for today!"

You give her a weak goodbye. Everyone else in the office has gone so it's just you and the janitor. Walking dejectedly over to Amanda's office, you bring her shoes there and are about to polish them. Just before you do, you stare at the slightly dirty insole. Finding it hard to resist, you check no one else is around, before you bring both shoes to your nose, breathing deeply in her foot scent. It's musty and powerful. It makes you feel even more inferior to your new boss. Sighing with how pathetic you, you manage to polish them in a few minutes and finally head off home.
11311211111211121111111.title: Downward Spiral

113112111112111211111111.content:
Becoming Amanda's glorified assistant means you've got something else to think about and focus on, other than Tora's feet. Each morning, your routine tasks become automatic, from getting her coffee to walking Fifi, her dog. You're able to carry out all of your work on top of this, meaning you have to arrive earlier and stay later.

Amanda leaves a good couple of hours before you after a couple of weeks or so into your new roles, always giving you a list of things to do before she heads off for drinks, for Zumba, the gym...or wherever she's going. You are at the office for nearly twelve hours a day, yet get the same money as before. Amanda, meanwhile, does very little work, stays for less time than you, yet gets around a thousand extra dollars per month. It may not be fair, but it is life.

Unfortunately, things get even worse for you. After Amanda has left her office, you resume you favourite position of the day, smelling her work shoes, before polishing them. You always check that no one else is around and that her office is locked, just in case. Just as you're inhaling deeply one evening, the door is suddenly unlocked and opened. So lost in absorbing her foot stench, you don't even notice until a cough from Amanda makes you freeze with fear.

"Well, this is unexpected! Are you actually smelling my shoes?" Amanda stands, arms folded in front of you, in her gym gear.

"I...I...er...um," you babble, hurriedly putting the shoe down.

She stares at you, her expression hard to read. "I noticed you looking at my feet before...when we worked next to each other. I thought it was like, a quirk. You were totally getting off on sniffing my shoes! I could take this one of two ways, Ross. Either you're an absolute pervert who deserves to be fired, or you're such a loyal assistant and so devoted to your boss that you need to be constantly humbled by them. What would you say - the first or the second one?"

"The...the second one," you say quickly. "Please, Amanda, please..."

Your voice trails off as she holds a hand in front of you, walking a little closer. "No need. It's clear that you're such a good, devoted assistant that you need more jobs to remind me how far beneath me you are. Let's face it, in the space of a few weeks I've completely eclipsed you that it's actually embarrassing we were not along ago on the same level..." She says this matter-of-factly. "Anyway, I've got a new job for you. As you're so enamoured with my shoes, you can be - how did I describe your new position as being - oh, directly under me. You will still bring my coffee and food, walk my dog, but I'll get the others to take up the slack on your programming. Instead of doing that, you will spend any time you're doing those errands at the foot of my desk, massaging my feet, being my personal footstool.

You gulp. "F-foot stool?" It does excite you yet would be such a demeaning experience for you, considering you were once going for the same promotion....

"Yes," she says, smiling. "Or, we go with the first option!"

Shaking your head, you know that would completely destroy your career, and the prospects for any decently paid job again. You've just paid Tora two thousand dollars and have already dipped into your savings to pay for bills and basic living costs.

"Good boy! Let's test you out now, while I send those emails I had completely forgotten about...." She points her fingers downwards so you can hop onto the floor and lie down. Thankfully the desk is panelled so no one, other than her could see you. Amanda slips off her trainers and stretches her legs out so that her white ankle socks, damp with sweat cover your face.

"Oooh, very comfortable. I think you'll be the perfect fit!" She scrunches her toes approvingly against your defeated face while you merely grunt. She types away for a couple of minutes, while you try your best to think of something to avoid getting an erection. It doesn't work; you have a raging hard on by the time she's finished sending her emails.

"Ok, Ross. Or should I say 'foot stool', I'm off. You can finish your tasks now. See you tomorrow!" She gives you a cheery wave under the desk before picking up her trainers and leaving you alone.

Your new position as Amanda's foot stool-errand boy is perfect for you. You still do the menial tasks as before, but for several hours a day, in between these jobs, you lie under your boss's desk as she places her feet, sometimes sock-covered, sometimes bare over your grateful face. You've consigned yourself to wearing a chastity device at all times, knowing that showing an erection would surely get you fired! Your coworkers assume that you're not at your old desk any more as you're working on a 'special project' elsewhere in the office. They mock you when they see you fetching coffee or walking Fifi, calling you a 'brown-noser' and 'Amanda's bitch', which you ignore.

Amanda has it all. She does effortlessly well as a manager, that promotions keep coming her way, while you stay on exactly the same salary and continue to work directly under her. No one ever notices you under her desk, massaging away at her feet, or occasionally, when you're very lucky, sucking on her toes or licking her soles lovingly. This sometimes happens during meetings; Amanda does well to stifle giggles when your tongue tickles her feet or toes. Your errands start to decrease as she enjoys you so much as a foot stool. As the months pass, others are given the tasks of dog-walking and coffee fetching as you're gradually a permanent feature under her desk.

All you do in your spare time is go home, remove the chastity device and fantasise about Amanda at her feet. You can't afford to do much else; most of your salary goes straight to Tora. She's made you set up a standing order so she doesn't have to see you each month. That's fine with you - Amanda, well her feet specifically, is the only object of your affection now!

It's the perfect situation for your boss. You are a constant reminder to her how well she's done, plus she knows that you cannot resist her feet, nor would dare speaking against her, knowing that she would destroy you, professionally and personally.

All you can do is hope that as she inevitably takes on more senior roles, and eventually is the head of the company one day, she keeps you on as her personal foot stool. That's the best you can hope for in life now!

Not wasting another second, you hurry back to yours, increasingly anxious that Lizzie will get there before you. Fortunately you're first back! Deciding instead to squash them down as much as possible, they just about fit under your bed.

The sound of the doorbell startles you. Lizzie!

Quickly tucking the sack of girls' socks deeper under the bed, you greet your girlfriend with as natural a smile as you can muster.

"Ross! Honey, how are you? How's your Dad?" Lizzie wraps her arms around your neck and kisses you on the cheek.

Finding yourself involuntarily stretching away from her, pangs of guilt still resonating inside you, you attempt to sound sincere. "He's n-not great. Um, come in..."

The next few minutes or so are more than awkward. Lizzie quizzes you about your supposedly injured father, while you find feel increasingly nervy and regretful that the lies just keep growing.

"Ross...Ross! Have you listened to a word I've said?" Lizzie squeezes your shoulder while you sit together on the couch. "When is he coming home?"

"Er, soon. I hope. Let's talk about something else..." You mumble, wishing that you could confide in her about everything but it's too late.

Lizzie stares at you. "Something's up. It's more than your Dad. Ross, tell me what's wrong."

There's no way you're even going to begin 'fessing up about the arrangement with Tora, the socks, the lies about your father.... In fact, right now you wish that you were alone so you could make a start on the enormous pile of socks under your bed....

"Look, I'm here for you but give me something! Do you even want me round at the moment?"

"Er....yeah, course but um...I'm just spent." You say, half-truthfully. Licking those socks clean recently really did take it out of you; a much bigger collection awaiting you is a daunting prospect.

"You know what, Ross - I'm just gonna go. There's something not right with you. I've never seen you like this and it's....I don't like it." Lizzie gets to her feet and begins walking towards the door. "Call me if you actually want to see me - until then, I'll leave you be."

Without turning around, Lizzie starts opening the door as you awkwardly rise to your feet, staring at her. Can you let her go as easily as this? Is this a convenient way of simplifying things, or a potentially huge mistake....this woman does truly care about you after all!

You think she might be mistaking the role of servant to that of a slave... but you want to earn your paycheck so you decide to keep quiet about it.
You and Valerie walk out from the cafe. Obviously she leads the way of your walk. As you walk with her, you hope that you will be allowed to return to Lizzie's place as soon as possible, and that Valerie won't have any more ideas about where you could go with her.
12222222112212.title: Finishing coffee, and going for a walk

122222221122121.content:
"Come on, serviteur, let's go!" Valerie snaps her fingers at you as she strides ahead at a brisk pace. After a few minutes or so, the French girl seems a little tired so she makes a call for her limousine to come and collect her. It seems unnecessarily showy, but it helps to further the image of how easily Valerie can get whatever she wants...

Before you know it, you're back at Valerie's. Her home is magnificent; it's practically a mansion! Immediately she takes you upstairs, along the spiralling staircase until you reach the first floor. She tells you to wait while she uses the bathroom. In the corner of your eye, you see what looks like an enormous closet for shoes... Not able to quell your curiosity, you creep forward and gaze in bewilderment at the sheer numbers of shoes. There must be over a hundred here! Picking up a pair of slippers, you simply cannot resist bringing them to your nose for a quick sniff.

"Ahem!" Valerie coughs behind you, stopping you dead in your tracks. "You! You were sniffing my slipper! You 'ave un fétiche des pieds....foot fetish!"

You start to deny it but she has none of it. In mere seconds, Valerie orders you to lie on the ground as she hovers a flawless, gorgeous sole over your face and smiles while you let out a defeated whimper, finally admitting your fetish to her.

"As you 'ave an...obsession...for my feet," she states arrogantly, "Then 'zis means you will get no money after all. Your payment will be to get to pamper my feet! You will spend your days cleaning my shoes. Yes, zis will be very useful for me!"

Knowing that you're too enamoured with her to even consider saying know, you accept the fact that from this moment on, you are Valerie's unpaid foot bitch!

"You will live 'ere. If you clean every shoe to my...satisfaction then you will get to pamper my feet before you sleep 'ere." Valerie gives you a confident look before pointing at her vast array of footwear, knowing that you are now powerless to resist or refuse her.

And she's right! It's a bit like a kid being in a chocolate factory, so entranced are you by being surrounded by this many different heels, flats, slippers, sandals, flip flops, pumps, kicks....there are at least two hundred pairs of shoes here! Reverently, you hold a dark pink open-toed heel in your hands, and lick the expensive leather lovingly. You can't help but enjoy the fact that you are serving such a divine, flawless being as Valerie! Hours pass quickly; before you know it, Valerie has returned and is clicking her fingers impatiently at you.

"'Ave you finished?" She stares at you expectantly, her bare feet curling a little against the marble floor, which makes you nearly moan in pleasure.

"No...no...madam Valerie...I still have...." You point to at least another few dozen pairs of shoes.

She frowns. "In zat case, you will lick all these shoes clean during the night. In ze morning, if you 'ave done a good job, you may kiss my feet then..."

You let out a small whine, but know you are incapable of refusing her. You nod meekly. "Yes, Madam Valerie..." Which makes her nod with approval as she turns on her heel.

The next morning, you're so tired that you barely notice Valerie's soft sole lightly tapping your face as you groggily stir from your position on the floor. "You may kiss," she states after finally inspecting each shoe.

Weeks and months trickle past until you can barely remember your previous life. You are firmly entrenched as Valerie's shoe cleaner - everyone in the mansion knows of you and regard you as the lowest position possible - unpaid and spending most of your days licking shoes clean. Yet, for you, the minutes where you are allowed to kiss and lick Valerie's gorgeous soles are beyond heaven! You've had to have a chastity device fitted, as Valerie does not care for seeing your manhood every time you're around her feet. This isn't so bad; every few days, she allows you to masturbate into one of her socks, which is then promptly thrown away.

Being Valerie's devoted slave is a limited life, admittedly. However, you're so devoted to her flawless feet that it's all you need!

First of the females, has a long, messy yet seeming stylized orange hair. Second female had her hair stylized into spikes all around her head, and it was colored pink. The male had a red mohawk.

12222222112212222.content:
Just before Wade lifts a fist to your face one more time, Ivy and Lexi suddenly hold firmly onto his arm. You feel a wave of gratitude sweep over you. They're not going to hurt you any more thank God!

"What?" Wade gives his female friends an exasperated look.

Ivy snickers as she tosses her long orange hair out of her eyes. "I wanna make this guy feel like nothing! Look at him, with his fancy-wancy Frenchie-Wenchie - who has totally left you now by the way - and thinking he's better than us!"

Not daring to risk getting any more of a beating, you stick out your tongue and begin to lick the base of Lexi's boot, feeling like the lowest of the lows. It's a humbling experiencing licking all the dirt and grime from the female punk's boots. When she is satisfied, she swaps places with Ivy, who nods approvingly at your subservience.

"Who's your boss?" Ivy asks you, a sneer on her face. "That little French skank or us?"

"You...you're my...boss..." you say weakly, finishing licking the rest of the dirt of Ivy's disgusting boot. The two women exchange grins.

"I don't feel convinced. Do you, Lexi?" Ivy says, a mock-pout on her face. "I think we should do the same with our boots off..."

You grimace as the punks toss of their boots and place their nasty, putrid-smelling bare feet all over your face. You merely whimper as they take it in turns to stand on your face, march up and down on your chest, rub their smelly soles all over your nose and mouth until you're begging for mercy.

"Please...please...please!" You whine, completely broken. "Please - you've won!"

Groaning, you admittedly are intrigued to see if these girls' feet taste as bad as they smell... Sure enough you do! You lap up the dank, musty flavour from each of the four feet that are presented to you, swallowing thickly bits of dirt and whatever else is stuck to their feet. After a little while, you get used to the bitter, vinegary flavour. It actually becomes pretty palatable, as you've managed to clean off most of the grime.

Staring up at them with defeat, you know that they have you. Even if you wanted to resist them, they'd only beat you down. All you do is nod and kiss their feet, which makes them high five each other once more.

122222221122122231.content:
Ignoring the limousine that has parked up, you put your health first, going along with Officer Leona to hospital. You find out that she's not got a boyfriend and is actually looking forward to some time off work - a seven day shift has just finished and she has a week's holiday. She's also indeed from Costa Rica originally, which explains the slight accent and dark appearance.

"So - there you go. Now, remember. Stay safe and keep away from lowlifes!" She smiles at you, her brown eyes twinkling as you start exiting the vehicle.

"What you up to now?" You ask her out of curiosity.

She stretches. "I'm kinda wired. Like I said, got some time off coming up..."

"You could...." You aren't great at being forward with women. "Come up to mine...for a coffee?"

"Why not? I guess you owe me one!" She grins at you. "Let me bring up my stuff to get changed..."

In a few minutes times, Leona emerges from the bathroom, wearing a tight white vest and jeans, her brown hair now hanging down. There's no doubt about it - she's gorgeous!

"No..no...it's not..." You say, regretting instantly the offer to her.

To be honest, I haven't made a friend in quite a long time. So focused on my work, you know? I'm happy to come over here, have a bit of a chat, you rub my feet. The good thing is, you're like, zero threat. You're not a guy who is gonna try something, or make something happen. You're not someone I would go for. Which is a good thing!" She quickly adds, sensing she's offended you.

"Well, I feel like I owe you," you say truthfully. "You saved my life..."

"I'm happy you being my little foot rubber. As long as you're happy that nothing's ever gonna happen. Like I said, no offence and all, but you're just not my type. Is that all OK with you?" The policewoman asks you, giving you a look.

She smirks as she terminates the call and casually drops your phone on the floor. Calmly, she explains that Tora wants nothing more to do with you, in fear of losing her job. Valerie's dad is basically Tora's boss!

From that moment, your life is totally dedicated to Valerie and her feet. The way she dealt with Tora has made you even more in awe of her than before. Gratefully, you submit to her completely.

Weeks and months trickle past until you can barely remember your previous life. It doesn't take Valerie long to decide to pay you with a different kind of currency - time with her feet! 1222222211221222322111132121.content:

She makes it crystal clear that you've moved on from her, that you only serve the French girl and have no need for her! You can just about hear the choked voice of Lizzie on the other end of the phone...she has every right to be upset after all!

It's brutal to listen to but it does mean that the issue with Lizzie is resolved, thanks to Valerie.

"Now 'zat jeune fille is dealt with, you can give me my foot rub," The French girl tells you imperiously, an arrogant expression on her gorgeous face.

You comply. Even though you should be angry at her for ending things with Lizzie, you know deep down it's for the best. You're never going to be able to resist or say no to Valerie. She is so far out of your league that you're genuinely grateful just to be at her feet!

Looking down at you, literally in this case, Valerie suddenly moves her feet away from your hands and rests them on your face.

"'Zat is an even better fit for you, serviteur," she states matter-of-factly. "You are obsessed with my feet. Non?"


With a tremendous effort, you splutter out some words at last. "Yes...I am your devoted slave...I will do anything for you...I want to be at your feet....all the time!" You whine.

Valerie nods with approval while you lie with her feet in your face. "Tres bien. You will be my personal....foot stool. From now on, your face will be used to rest my feet on. You will be over 'ere..." She walks over to her dresser and pulls out a drawer that is long enough to fit your entire body in. Gesturing for you to get in, you do so immediately, walking awkwardly with your erect member throbbing.

Valerie smiles as she places her bare feet over your face, repositioning the drawer so that only your face can be seen. "You will sleep 'ere. Every morning, I will put my feet on your face while I prepare. Then you will stay in 'ere. One of my maids will feed you and make sure you are clean. Then I will use you again. And again."

What else can you do other than totally surrender to the French beauty? Just the thought of saying 'no' to her seems impossible. As the next morning comes, you merely moan with pleasure as heavenly soles cover your face while she does her make up and foundation. It takes a good fifteen minutes, so you savour every single second. The routine she laid out to you is put into place immediately. It's humiliating to be washed down by a maid each day, as well as being fed on the most meagre pieces of bread and water. The maid barely looks at you, considering you as an unpleasant piece of dirt.

Still, the times when you act as Valerie's foot stool make life worth living. Maybe, if your face continues to be a fitting stool for her feet, she'll allow you to sleep at the foot of her bed. That would be the ultimate promotion!

12222222112213.content:
Feeling relieved that Valérie has finally allowed you to get up from the floor, you begin to use your hands to hoist yourself back up to the seat, subtly so that no one will see.

Before you can get very far, your phone begins to ring unexpectedly! Automatically, you grab it out of your pocket to cancel the all. How to draw attention to yourself or what! To your surprise, suddenly Valérie uses one foot to pin you firmly to the ground, while she scoops your phone with one hand and leans back to answer it. You don't even know who it is yet!

"Bonjour!" She says happily. "I'm sorry? Non this is Valérie. Ross? Mon serviteur?"

Valérie lets out a giggle while your cheeks burn red with embarrassment. "Yes - my servant! He's busy. Really? He will return your call - we are still in the café. Au revoir!"

Removing her foot from your chest, the beautiful French girl beckons you to sit back down on the seat opposite her, which you do so quickly. She hands you back your phone. You stare across at her, not quite believing that she has just told someone you know that you are her servant!

"So...that was Tora," she says.

Your heart sinks. For a brief time, the thought of your ex girlfriend had not really entered your head.

"What did she want?" You ask Valérie a little awkwardly. The idea of Tora thinking you are an actual servant to - as far as your ex knows - a random French woman fills you entirely with dread...

She smiles at you confidently. "Well, she wanted to know who I was." Valérie pauses, as though she was offended by this. "She wanted to know where you were and then she wanted you to call her back."

You have an uneasy feeling about this; as far as Tora knows, you're out of town. Why would she need to call you? Has Beth said something after all?

"Don't worry, you're my serviteur now. You're all mine - not hers," she grins.

You almost feel comforted. Valérie is a such a gorgeous, confident young woman - as her servant you do seem to be in her protection!
12222222112213.title: An unexpected call

122222221122131.content:
Your calmness quickly turns to a feeling of sheer terror when you hear a very familiar voice just metres away. Tora herself has suddenly entered the cafe! Icy fear gripping your insides, you try your best not to panic and hope that she stays oblivious to the fact that you are right by her.

"So, mon serviteur, you fully accept your...position, oui?" Valerie says. "Zis...Tora - she will not matter."

Your heart in your mouth, you close your eyes and hope that your ex girlfriend is out of earshot...

"Excuse me, did you just say my name?" Tora's unmistakably confident voice is now even closer. "Who are you talking to?"

Valerie giggles a little. "Zis does not matter to you."

"Er, yeah it does. I heard my name, and I just spoke to you on the phone - your accent is pretty distinctive!" Tora retorts, sounding a little agitated.

The gorgeous French girl sighs. "Fine. 'Ere 'e is..." She clicks her fingers with one pointing directly at you, both her bare feet still pressed on your chest. Mortifying, Tora bends down, her surprised face appearing as she stares down under the table at you.

"Well, well, well. So this is what you call 'out of town'?" Your ex says with an unimpressed look about her.

"'E is of no concern to you. 'E is my serviteur now," Valerie states arrogantly.

"Your...serviteur? You've actually become a servant? Wow, you've really hit a new low, freak!"

Valerie sniffs disapprovingly. "'E is my freak. Now leave us be."

"Ooh, I would love to leave you two be...I just hope your little 'servant' here doesn't mind when I post this all over Facebook.

From your angle on the floor you can just about make out the French girl's shoulders shrug. "C'est la vie. You are...'ow you say... jealous that I 'ave 'im."

"I'm not jealous of a brat like you," Tora snarls. "I just think the world should know about this little arrangement..."

"Oh, you can do that. My father - he is a wealthy busninessman, I'm sure I can find out from your sister, Beth, enough about you. Enough to make things difficile for you..."

The two women exchange several more barbs, your ex gradually realising that Valerie has an answer for everything. In the end, Tora flounces off, muttering under her breath. Valerie reassures you that none of it will matter as you're her devoted servant now.

And she's right! You become her loving, devoted servant, spending your days licking her vast arrays of shoes clean, paid not in money, but by time with her bare feet - which is all you basically desire. Tora, Lizzie, Beth...all the details of your previous life become increasingly vague and blurry as you submit further and further to the beautiful French princess that you adore and worship!

Stepping inside Valerie's enormous mansion, the inside is similarly ornate and beautiful. You feast your eyes on the chandeliers, amazing artwork, golden tapestry along the ceiling...it is a real sight to behold!
